We'll do our best to stop the altar...{nl}Could you possibly get rid of the Crabil?
I'll stop the altar if you can buy me some time.{nl}Here goes nothing!
Are you alright?{nl}I don't know how I can thank you enough...
My goodness..{nl}The Crabil has ruined all of the offerings that were meant for the goddess.{nl}
We won't be able to offer any of this to the goddess..{nl}This is quite troubling..{nl}
Ah well, I suppose it can't be helped.{nl}Could I possibly ask you to order some coral handicrafts while we repair the altar?
There are some precious corals growing near the Kranta Skerries.{nl}Please provide Joana, the Accessory Merchant of Fedimian with the blue coral for the goods.{nl}
I would normally craft them myself but the situation is less than optimal as you may see...{nl}I know it's a long way to go but I beg of you...
Hello!{nl}Please feel free to take your time!{nl}
Hmm? You've come here to request some coral accessories?{nl}Oh... It's been a long time since I've seen any coral.{nl}
The quality seems to be impecable as well.{nl}All right. I'll do it.
I would normally craft them myself but the situation is less than optimal as you may see...{nl}I know it's a long way to Fedimian, but I beg of you.
However, I also have a request since this is a hard task.{nl}I would prefer to receive some Gapcrab Shell as compensation.{nl}
Of course, I won't receive any that are cracked or dented.{nl}Do you agree to the conditions?
Well then, off you go.{nl}I'll start working assuming that you'll bring me some quality materials.
Gapcrab Shell from the Kranta Skerries.{nl}I won't accept them if they've been damaged too much.
Did you bring the Shell?{nl}
The Shell seems to be in good condition.{nl}I haven't seen such quality Shell for a while now...{nl}
I'll be able to use these to craft great accessories.{nl}Here you go, the coral accessories that you've requested.
Finally... The goddesses have listened to our prayers!{nl}They have been silent for so long..{nl}
This is all thanks to you.{nl}We would have taken so much longer without your help.{nl}
This is only the beginning.{nl}We must gather our strength and prepare for further hardships.{nl}
Thank you so much... for all the help!
Those useless monsters have destroyed the coral that was Goddess Jurate's blessing.{nl}I'd like to make them pay, but I must protect the altar... There is no way that the two of us can...
Please. The monsters found at the Kranta Skerries.{nl}Show them that they can't destroy the coral without getting punished.
Thank you so much.{nl}I'm thinking of tidying the place up once the altar becomes safe.
Hmm... Come to think of it... {nl}It's no use if the monsters come back after they've been driven off.{nl}
So I think that it may be better to just scare them..{nl}Could you possibly be asked to help us once more?{nl}
Please gather the monster's energy after dealing with them.{nl}They won't bother us again if we put it near the Cranto Coast.{nl}
Thank you once again for agreeing to help us.
Remember, monsters from other regions don't count.{nl}Please fill it with the energy from monsters from this region.
You've already filled it with energy?{nl}It would have taken me ages... Well, I won't deny that you've got talent.{nl}
I'll go and bury the talisman since this will only take a moment.{nl}Thank you for helping.
{nl}May the blessings of Goddess Jurate be upon you...
Thank you for helping us get back in touch with Goddess Jurate again.{nl}This was all possible thanks to your help...{nl}
We're thinking of taking care of the altar for a while.{nl}So we want to gather some of the ocean's energy in advance... Could you help us do so?
Go to Sniega Sentry and collect some special stones.{nl}You'll be able to spot which ones are special by spraying them with this divine water and collecting the ones that glow blue.
The stones that glow blue when sprayed by divine water.{nl}I just need those particular stones.
You've returned. Thank you so much.{nl}Let me take a look at the stones.
They all seem to be pristine.{nl}All we have to do is to place these stones where the ocean's energy is the strongest!
Ah, will you do that?{nl}It's near Polybba Marshlands and Sahguma Lagoon.{nl}
If you take a look at where the water is flowing..{nl}You'll easily spot where the ocean's energy gathers.
We'll be fine as long as there is enough energy from the oceans.{nl}I'm sure Goddess Jurate will be pleased as well.{nl}
I think we can finally relax a bit.{nl}The altar will be filled with the ocean's energy about the time when it stabilizes.{nl}
We are in your debt.{nl}I will pray for Goddess Jurate to bless your journey.
Come back anytime if you have any more clues about Ebonypawn.{nl}I will provide you with as much information as I can. Thanks.{nl}
I'll gather the Red Kepa peels.
For Safety
Monsters From the Settlement Clearing
Too Much For One Person
Vanished Glory
I don't think that's needed,
Nice Place to Live
That doesn't sound right.
Protect the Royal Masoleum
Hidden Magic Devices
That doesn't really matter.
Efforts Towards Redemption
Lost Pilgrim
Stay here and rest for a while.
Dangerous Distraction
Good Day to Recover
For What
Hidden Farming Equipment
Can-do Spirit
Habitat
Thinking Ahead
Violent Rampage
Hoping the Goddess Will Recover
Stuffy Colleagues
I can help you a little.
Find the Hidden Artifacts
Observing the Owl (1)
That's going to be difficult, sorry.
Talking about what you heard.
Memories of the Sleeping Owl
I'll hand you the sculpture.
Goddess Jurate's Loremaster (1)
Raising an Altar(1)
I don't think I can help you, sorry.
Raising an Altar (2)
I'll go and help you a bit more.
Raising an Altar (3)
I'll lead them so they won't be able to approach.
That sounds way too dangerous.
Retaking the Altar
I'll get rid of that Crabil.
I need some time to prepare.
Better Offerings
I'm sorry, I don't think I can help you any longer.
What Interests You These Days
Okay, let's do that.
That's too difficult for me.
Ceremony for the Goddess
Winning Favors (1)
I'll drive the monsters away from Kranta Skerries.
I'll do it, but I'm gonna rest for a while first.
Winning Favors (2)
I'll fill the talisman with the energy from monsters.
I have to go do something else, sorry.
Preparing for the Future (1)
I'll think about it.
Preparing for the Future (2)
I'll do it; I'll place the stones.
Sorry, I need to get going now.
Dagger's Owner
I remember experiencing something similar.
I'm curious about it as well.
The Operations Officer seems to have realized something about the Vubbe Cloth. Talk to him again.
The Hunter Master told you that he will acknowledge you as a Hunter if you help him find the books. Search for the books at Vubbe Outpost as the Hunter Master told you.

The Hunter Master says that the Quarel Shooter Master may be interested in trading the book for tough Glizardon leather. Go to Tenet Church B1 next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village. Bring back the Glizardon leather from there.
The Archer Master, who is currently fixing the wall, has the next book. Collect boulders from the entrance of Crystal Mines next to the Miners' Village for the Archer Master.

The Quarrel Shooter Master has requested that you help find some books. First, go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Woods. Then look for the book at the Vubbe Outpost as the Quarrel Shooter Master mentioned.
You have obtained the book from the Hunter Master. Return to the Quarrel Shooter Master for the next book.

The Quarrel Shooter Master says that you can obtain the next book from the Archer Master who is currently repairing the wall. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Woods and collect boulders for the Archer Master.

The Archer Master has requested help in order to find the book. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Woods. Next, go to the Vubbe Outpost and look for the book there as the Archer Master mentioned.

The Archer Master says that the Quarel Shooter Master may be interested in trading the book for tough Glizardon leather. Go to Tenet church next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village. Bring back the Glizardon leather from there.

The Ranger Master has requested help in order to find the book. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Woods. Next, go to the Vubbe Outpost and look for the book there as the Archer Master mentioned.

The Ranger Master says that the Quarel Shooter Master may be interested in trading the book for tough Glizardon leather. Go to Tenet church next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village. Bring back the Glizardon leather from there.
First, go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Woods. Then look for boulders in the area mentioned by the Ranger Master.

Go to the basement of Tenet Church next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village. Then obtain Coarse Bark from the Yognomes there in exchange for the Peltasta Master's cooperation.

The Peltasta Master has given you one mission. Go to the basement of Tenet Church next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village. Then obtain Glizardon Black Claws from that area.

Go to Tenet Garden next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village. Then, install the Pot of Fire next to the monsters that can be found there in order to collect the energy of fire.
The Cyromancer wishes that you will help find a book. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Woods. Then seek out the Mayor of the Miners' Village and ask about where the book might be.

The Swordman Master wishes to gain insight to advancing his skills. Go to the basement of Tenet Church next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village. Then learn what the Swordman Master was trying to express by defeating the Glizardons there.
The Priest Master wishes to prove sincerity to the goddess. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Woods. Then find the possessed soldier in Miners' Village and perform an exorcism.

Go to Tenet Church next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village in order to obtain the ingredients requested by the Wizard Master. You will be able to obtain Galok Fur from the ground floor, Egnome Fragments from the second floor and Glizardon Horns from the 1st basement floor.
The Cleric Master has requested help curing the patients. Cure the patients after obtaining Divine Water from the Priest and Krivis Masters.
You have obtained Divine Water from the Priest and Krivis Masters. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Woods and cure the patients there.
Talk to Stonemason Canolyn
You have met a very perplexed looking Stonemason Canolyn. Talk to Stonemason Canolyn.
Report back to Stonemason Canolyn
It seems as if you have reduced a fair amount of Cockatrices. Report back to Stonemason Canolyn.
Stonemason Canolyn says that her equipment has been stolen by monsters. Talk to her again.
Unfortunately, there is no equipment box. Go back to Stonemason Canolyn.
Collecting Cockat Tails
Tara Miles says that the Cockat is already dying and wants to have it's tail. Obtain the Cockat tail from the other side of the Camp of Apiarists.
Hand the Cockat tail to Tara Miles
You seem to have obtained enough Cockat tails. Go back to Tara Miles.
Obtain Cockat tails
As proof of your sincerety, the Priest Master wants you to collect
. Head to the Miners' Village after passing through East Siauliai Woods. Then, defeat the Vubbes near the Miners' Village and collect

The Krivis Master says that the Krivis brother that had been transporting the Holy Relic has disappeared. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Forest. Then try looking for the missing Krivis brother there.
Collect Red Keppa Peels from the Miners' Village
The Swordman Master has asked you to prove that you are worthy of using a sword. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Forest. Then deal with the Red Kepas to obtain their peels.
You have collected all of the required Red Kepa peels. Give the peels to the Swordman Master.
Obtain Red Kepa Peels
Defeat Red Kepa
The Wizard Master is emphasizing the importance of tenacity. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Forest. Then deal with the Red Kepa there before returning to the Wizard Master.
You have dealed with all the Red Kepa. Go back and report to the Wizard Master.
Defeat Jukopus to Obtain their Cores
The Archer Master wishes to test your skills to see if you are worthy. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Forest. Defeat the Jukopus there to obtain their cores.
You have collected enough Jukopus cores. Give them to the Archer Master.
Obtain Jukopus Cores

The Cleric Master says that you will be able to advance your skills further through servitude. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Forest. Defeat the Vubbes near the Miners' Village and collect green ointment.
You can barely see someone. Try talking to him.
Go to Tenet Church next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village. Then, collect Pawndel Soul Crystals and Pawnd Mind Crystals from the ground floor.
Defeat Jukopus near the Miners' Village
You must pass a test to become a Peltasta. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Forest and defeat the Jukopus there.
You have dealed with all of the Jukopus. Go and report to the Peltasta Master.
Defeat the Vubbe at the Miners' Village.
You must pass a test to become a Highlander. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Forest and defeat the Vubbe there.
Defeat the Vubbe at the Miners' Village.
The Pyromancer says that you will be allowed to learn if you help the research. Go and help the Bokor Master who is currently cooperating with the Pyromancer Master on a research project.
You've found a villager, but they appear to be wounded. Ask the villager what happened.
Find a lens from the Miners' Village

The Quarrel Shooter says that he is looking for the telescope that used to be at the Astral Tower and has learned something about the whereabouts of its lens. Try finding the lens at the Miners' Village past the East Siauliai Forest.
Collect Vubbe Poison Samples

The Ranger Master mentioned an assassin by the name of Ebonypawn and wants to have a sample of his poison. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Forest and collect poison samples from the Vubbe there.
Obtain %s by Defeating Vubbe
Gustas says that only the final seal remains but is worried about a dangerous presence. Break the seal left of the Collapsed Sanctum. You should also be wary of monster attacks.

The Ranger Sub-master wishes that the Rangers will help the people by participating in the reconstruction of Orsha. Go to Koru Jungle past the Woods of the Linked Bridges and Paupys Crossing. You will be able to find stones that can be used to reconstruct Orsha there.

The Sapper Sub-master is researching new Sapper techniques. Go to Koru Jungle past the Woods of the Linked Bridges and Paupys Crossing. You will be able to find some stones there that can be used for research purposes.
Joana seems to know something about this sculpture. Talk to Joana about the sculpture.
Agente Moren parece saber de alguma coisa. Fale com ele
Verifique o Purificador em Crystal Mine 3F.
Parece que o purificador não tem energia suficiente. Leve o Emergency Power Source e complete-o com magia dos cristais ao redor. Utilize esta magia para repor a energia do purificador.
Você arrecadou energia suficiente. Volte para o Purificador e restaure-o.
Vigia Molly at Srautas Gorge is waiting for your help.
Vigia Molly thinks that the reason behind the strange behavior of the Pantos is the Sugar Beets that they enjoy eating. Get rid of the Sugar Beets like Molly suggested.
You have removed enough Plateau Sugar Beets. Report back to Vigia Molly.
Vigia Molly is waiting for someone's help at Gele Plateau.
Dealing with Nearby Monsters
Vigia Molly requires monster information in order to effectively use Shaman Dolls on Gele Plateau. Defeat Spion Archers, Leaflies and Mali in order to deal with the new monsters to give Molly advice.
This should be enough information for Molly. Go back and tell Molly what you have learned about the monsters.
Priest Draznie is looking for help in Ashaq Underground Prison 2F.
Priest Draznie has asked you to collect some traps she set up a long time ago. According to her, most traps are set up in the Waiting Room and the Supply Room.
You have collected a large number of malfunctioning traps. Take them to Priest Draznie.
Priest Gelija is waiting for help in Ashaq Underground Prison 3F
Priest Gelija has asked you to clear out the Varvs that have been terrorizing the priests in Ashaq Underground Prison. They are often found at the Felon Prison.
You have cleared out enough Varvs. Report to Gelija.
A traveling merchant in Koru Jungle is waiting for help.
Deliver the Blue Coal to the Merchant
You have collected enough blue coal. Deliver it to the merchant.
Seguidor Vaidutis on the Ground Floor of Tenet Church is waiting for help.
Collect Orb Crystals
Seguidor Vaidutis asked you to collect orb crystals in order to craft a Holy Stone to complete his mission. You can find orb crystals near the Worship Anteroom and Nuosirdum Chapel.
Report back to Seguidor Vaidutis
You have collected sufficient amounts of orb crystals. Take them to Seguidor Vaidutis.
Historian Kepeck is waiting for help on Apvija Hill.
Historian Kepeck says that he has nothing to protect him. Defeat monsters from the surrounding area to keep him safe.
Report back to Historian Kepeck
You have dealed with enough monsters. Go back to Kepeck.
Talk to Historian Grenus
Historian Grenus is waiting for help at the Gateway of the Great King.
Find Worn Ancient Scriptures
Historian Grenus wishes to produce some research results by excavating relics at the Gateway of the Great King. Look for Worn Ancient Scriptures from the excavation site while he takes a rest.
Report back to Historian Grenus
You have collected sufficient Worn Ancient Scriptures. Take them to Historian Grenus even if you don't think they are worth much.
Talk to Epigrafista Deltlan
Epigrafista Deltlan is waiting for help at Overlong Bridge Valley.
Epigrafista Deltlan has asked you to deal with the monsters from the surrounding area so that he can carry on with his research.
Report back to Epigrafista Deltlan
You have dealed with enough monsters. Go back to Epigrafista Deltlan.
Fiel Kazis is waiting for help at Kvailas Forest.

Fiel Kazis desperately wishes for the defiled forest to be cleansed of demons. Deal with demons in the surrounding area to make his wish come true.
Report back to Fiel Kazis
You have defeated enough monsters at Kvailas Forest. Report back to Fiel Kazis.
Fiel Bronius is waiting for help at Kvailas Forest.
Cleansing the Defiling Energies
Fiel Bronius wishes to cleanse Kvailas Forest of the demon energy that is defiling it. Let's cleanse Kvailas Forest of the demon's energy.
Report Back to Fiel Bronius
You have cleansed enough of the defiling energies. Report back to Fiel Bronius.
Tess, who is alone in Knidos Jungle, is waiting for hlep.
Collect Lapasape Wand Fragments
Collect Lapasape wand fragments to show that you have dealed with Lapasape Mages in order to calm Tess.
Take the Fragments to Tess
You have collected enough Lapasape wand fragments. This should be enough to calm Tess a bit. Go back to Tess.
Herbalist Talas is waiting for help at Dadan Jungle.
Collect Dry Dadania Leaves
Herbalist Talas has become injured by a trap after coming to collect dry Dadania leaves at Badoca Hill. Go find dry Dadania leaves from Dadania bushes at Badoca Hill for Talas.
Report back to Herbalist Talas
You have collected sufficient dry Dadania leaves. Report back to Herbalist Talas.
The Gloomy Owl sculpture at Karolis Springs is waiting for someone.
Rescue Spirits Taken by the Monsters

The Gloomy Owl sculpture says that the monsters near Duokliu Hall have swallowed all of the spirits it is supposed to lead. Find and deal with the monsters that have swallowed the spirits to free them.
Report back to the Gloomy Owl Sculpture
You have freed a great deal of spirits. Go back and report to the Gloomy Owl Sculpture.
Free the Swallowed Spirits
Talk to the Frail Owl Sculpture
The Frail Owl sculpture at Letas Stream is waiting for help.
Retreiving Fading Spirits
The Frail Owl sculpture asked you to bring back the fading spirits that ran away because of the monsters.

Acquired enough fading spirits. Go back to the Frail Owl sculpture.
The Mayor's granddaughter of Pelke Shrine Ruins is waiting for help.
The Mayor's granddaughter has asked you to collect antidote samples after defeating Merog Stingers.

Assistant Airine at Akmens Ridge is waiting for help.
Assistant Airine says that she will stay with Archeologist Dezic until he recovers. Help Airine nurse Dezic back to health safely by dealing with the monsters nearby.

Settler Rodonas says that he is unable to establish the settlement because there are too many monsters. Help Rodonas by defeating monsters near Bandrass Forkroad.

Talk with the Royal Mausoleum Guardian
The Royal Mausoleum Guardian is waiting for the Revelator on the ground floor.

The Royal Mausoleum Guardian says that those who once protected the Royal Mausoleum are now corrupt and are destroying that which they once protected. The Royal Mausoleum Guardian asked you to deal with the corrupted ones and the monsters that breached the defenses.
You have dealt with enough monsters. Go back to the Royal Mausoleum Guardian.
Talk to Laterous
Laterous from Baron Allerno is waiting for help.

Laterous is saying that the reason behind the disappearances and bad rumors is the monsters. Deal with the monsters from the surrounding area to see if that is true.

The Royal Mausoleum Guardian is waiting for the Revelator on the second floor.

The Royal Mausoleum Guardian has asked you to retrieve the essence from those that have forgotten their duties and are now destroying the Royal Mausoleum.

The Wandering Spirit of a Fiel is waiting for help at Carlyle's Mausoleum.
The Wandering Spirit of a Fiel has asked you to defeat the monster that killed him. Deal with the monsters from the surrounding area to apease the Spirit.

Seguidor Bigs is waiting for a Revelator at the Delmore Manor.

Seguidor Bigs says that he requires Condensed Magic from demons to help Melchioras. Defeat the demons from the surrounding area to collect condensed magic.

Pilgrim Seronia is waiting for help at Feretory Hills.
Pilgrim Seronia says that she has been chased by monsters all the way here. Deal with the monsters from the surrounding area so that she can rest a little.

Revelator Mihail is waiting for help at Delmore Outskirts.

Revelator Connor is waiting for help at Delmore Outskirts.
Collect Maroulu Herbs
Revelator Connor asked you to collect Maroulu Herbs Grass from the Fortress walls in order for the people with Melchioras to recover.

Baron Secretary Benius is waiting for help at Myrkiti Farm.
Baron Secretary Benius has asked you to defeat the monsters in the surrounding area that are hindering the work process.

Farmer Deluma is waiting for help at Tenants' Farm.
Collect the hidden farming tools
Farmer Deluma has asked you to retrieve the farming tools that were hidden to prevent them from being stolen by monsters and thieves.
Go back to Farmer Deluma
Acquired enough farming tools. Return to Famer Deluma and give them to him.
Necromancer Drasius is waiting for help at the Goddess' Ancient Garden.
Retrieve the Offering Pouches

Necromancer Drasius says that the reason behind the failed summoning was due to a lack of offerings. Drasius has asked you to retrieve the pouch containing offerings from the loosely strewn rocks near Dumbliu Pond.
Report back to Necromancer Drasius
You have gathered enough offering pouches. Go back to Necromancer Drasius.

Lumberjack Luoval is waiting for help at Escanciu Village.
Lumberjack Luoval says that there are too many monsters for him to gather lumber from Neryshkus Sanctum Ruins. Defeat the monsters there to allow Luoval to gather lumber.

Stonemason Canolyn is waiting for help at the Fedimian Suburbs.
Deal with the monsters at Leipsna Chapel Site
Stonemason Canolyn wishes to establish a trade hub that leads to Fedimian at Leipsna Chapel Site. Deal with the monsters there and return to Canolyn.

Priest Rovli is waiting for help at Bellai Rainforest.

Talk to Fiel Dreka
Fiel Dreka is waiting for help at Seir Rainforest.
Collect Ceyral Saplings
Fiel Dreka wishes to collect Ceyral Saplings for Goddess Rada to recover. Collect Ceyral Saplings from near Shulti Workshop and return to Dreka.

Talk to Merchant Dolonas
Merchant Dolonas is waiting for help at Fasika Plateau.
Merchant Dolonas has asked for help in order to pass Fasika Plateau safely. Deal with the monsters in the surrounding area to make it safer.

Talk to the Collection Member
The Collection Member at Manahas is waiting for help.
Excavate Manaryll Tombstones
The Collection Member has asked you to help find ancient Manahas relics from the Augalu Garden. Dig through the soil to find Manaryll Tombstones.
Report back to the Collection Member.
You have found enough Manaryll Tombstones. Hand them in to the Collection Member.
The Swordsman Submaster wishes to prove your skills as a Revelator. Go past the Woods of the Linked Bridges and defeat Red Kepas and Woodins in Paupys Crossing.
To judge your practical skills and strength, the Highlander Submaster has tasked you with defeating Woodins in Paupys Crossing. Go past the Woods of the Linked Bridges to get to Paupys Crossing.
The Swordsman Submaster has tasked you with defeating Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle to achieve an even stronger level. Go to the Dadan Jungle by passing Paupys Crossing, Koru Jungle and Knidos Jungle.

To evaluate how much you have grown as a Revelator, the Highlander Submaster has tasked you with defeating Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle. Go to the Dadan Jungle by passing Paupys Crossing, Koru Jungle and Knidos Jungle.

The Peltasta Submaster wants to test your shield-using abilities. Go to the Dadan Jungle by passing Paupys Crossing, Koru Jungle and Knidos Jungle. Equip a shield and hunt monsters once you get there. Defeating demons will earn you extra points. Alas, this is a task you will have to complete on your own.
The Hoplite Submaster has tasked you with defeating Rafflys at the Dadan Jungle. Go to the Dadan Jungle by passing Paupys Crossing, Koru Jungle and Knidos Jungle.
The Barbarian Submaster wants to test your mind for combat. Go to the Dadan Jungle by passing Paupys Crossing, Koru Jungle and Knidos Jungle. Defeat the Gosarus there and submit proof of your hunt.

The Priest Submaster has asked you to visit Koru Jungle, Knidos Jungle and Dadan Jungle and collect Wormwood, Hemostasis Herb and Moonlight Flower respectively in each area. Go those areas by passing Paupys Crossing and Koru Jungle.
Go to the Dadan Jungle by passing Paupys Crossing, Koru Jungle and Knidos Jungle. Then collect Raffly Soul Crystals and Vubbe Warrior Mind Crystals from Dadan Jungle.
Go meet Blacksmith Ilanai in Orsha to pass the request of Dievdirbys Submaster.
Talk with Blacksmith Ilanai in Orsha and ask about the necessary materials.

Blacksmith Ilanai doesn't have a chisel ready for you, but she can make one if you collect the right materials. Go to the Dadan Jungle by passing Paupys Crossing, Koru Jungle and Knidos Jungle. Defeat Grummers there and collect chunks of metal from them.
You have collected enough chunks of metal. Bring them to Blacksmith Ilanai in Orsha.
Talk with Blacksmith Ilanai in Orsha and receive the chisel.
You successfully defeated the monster after it suddenly attacking from beneath the water. Ask Napalis if they are all right.
Dievdirbys Asel is waiting for you at Grynas Hills. Go find Dievdirbys Asel.
Talk to the Quiet Owl Sculpture at Susipyne Hill Areas
Dievdirbys Asel suggests that you split up to investigate about the Escultura de Coruja. Go and take a look at the Quiet Owl Sculpture at Susipyne Hill Areas.
Talk to Dievdirbys Asel at the Siauras Valley
Unfortunately, the Quiet Owl Sculpture says that the information you seek is in the hands of the Sleeping Escultura de Coruja. Go to Siauras Valley where Dievdirbys Asel is.
Dievdirbys Asel has crafted a Small Owl Sculpture. Take it to the Friendly Owl Sculpture.
Go back to Dievdirbys Asel
The Friendly Owl Sculpture has given some of its powers to the Small Owl Sculpture. Go back to Dievdirbys Asel with the Sculpture.
The Broken Owl Sculpture has shown parts of the past. Talk about what you have seen with Dievdirbys Asel.
Check the situation of the Lemyra Sentry
It seems as if someone is fighting. Check if something is happening at Lemyra Sentry.
Talk to Loremaster Daroul
Loremaster Daroul is thanking you. Ask about what was happening.
Help Loremaster Daroul deal with the attacking monsters.
Loremaster Daroul is trying to find a way to contact Goddess Jurate. Try talking to Daroul again.
Collect Blue Coral
Loremaster Daroul is trying to craft something to offer to Goddess Jurate. He has asked you to help collect more Blue Coral as there is not enough to finish the product.
Hand the Blue Coral to Loremaster Daroul
You have collected sufficient amounts of Blue Coral. Go back and hand it to Loremaster Daroul.
Loremaster Daroul is satisfied with the collected Blue Coral. Ask him what he requires next.
Go and talk to Loremaster Daroul.
Loremaster Daroul says that his colleague has found a good place for an altar. Follow Loremaster Daroul.
Talk to Loremaster Verta
Loremaster Verta is waiting for you and Daroul. Talk to Loremaster Verta.
Lure and defeat monsters from the surrounding area.
Loremaster Verta says that the monsters in the surrounding area are hindering his efforts at creating an altar. Lure the monsters from the Old Bridge and Kranta Skerries by using the Smelly Parcel.
You have driven off the monsters. Go to Loremaster Verta and tell him about the results.
Loremaster Verta and Daroul have come from the Dellam Sandbank. Ask them what happened.
Retake the Altar to Goddess Jurate from the Crabil
They say that the Crabil was attracted to the ocean's energy. Defeat the Crabil that is near the altar.
You have driven off the Crabil. Go and talk to Loremaster Verta.
Protect the Loremaster and defeat the %s.
Loremaster Daroul seems to be in trouble. Ask what the problem is.

Loremaster Daroul says that the offerings that were placed on the altar have all been destroyed because of the Crabil. He has asked you to collect more Blue Coral and take it to the Fedimian Accessory Merchant Joana.
Talk to the Fedimian Accessory Merchant Joana
Loremaster Daroul has asked you to request that the Blue Coral be worked on by the Fedimian Accessory Merchant Joana. Talk to Joana.
Talk to Accessory Merchant Joana
You have requested the processing of the Blue Coral to Accessory Merchant Joana. Joana seems to have a request of her own.
Collect whole Shell from the Gap Crabs at Kranta Skerries
Accessory Merchant Joana has asked for whole Gap Crab Shell in return for her services. Collect whole Gap Crab Shell from the Igti Coast.
Deliver the Shell to Accessory Merchant Joana
You have collected the requested amount of Shell for Accessory Merchant Joana. Return to her.
Acquired the crafted Coral from Accessory Merchant Joana. Take the Coral to Loremaster Verta so it can be offered to Goddess Jurate.
Goddess Jurate has answered the call of the Loremasters! Talk to Loremaster Verta once more.
Loremaster Daroul is asking for a bit more help.
Dealing with the monsters at Kranta Skerries
Loremaster Daroul says that the monsters are wrecking the Coral at Kranta Skerries. He has asked you to deal with the monsters in the surrounding area.
You have dealt with enough monsters at Kranta Skerries. Report your actions to Loremaster Daroul.
Deal with the monsters wrecking Kranta Skerries

Fill Daroul's Pendant with the energy of monsters
Loremaster Daroul wishes to scare the monsters by filling his pendant with the energy from monsters. Fill his pendant with their energy by defeating them.
You have filled Daroul's Pendant with the energy of monsters. Go back to Daroul.
It seems as if Loremaster Verta is preparing something. Talk to Verta.
Collect the Blue Stones from Sniega Sentry
Loremaster Verta wishes to collect the ocean's energy ahead of time. Go to Sniega Sentry and collect the stones that shine blue in response to the Ocean's Divine Water.

You have collected all the Stones required by Loremaster Verta. Return and hand them over to Verta.
Loremaster Verta seems to have checked the quality of Stones. Talk to Verta.
Place the Blue Stones where the ocean's energy is gathering.
Loremaster Verta aproves of the quality of Blue Stones. He has asked you to place them where the energy of the ocean is gathering.
You have placed the Stones as Loremaster Verta requested. Go back and tell him that the deed is done.
Dievdirbys Asel is curious about the dagger's owner. Talk to Asel.
You have seen a similar case before. Ask the Ranger Master about the dagger.
