What happened?
Let's get some rest first.
Kupole Rescue Mission (1)
We should investigate the devices we found on our way here.
Kupole Rescue Mission (2)
Let's destroy them.
I'm not so sure about this, sorry.
Kupole Rescue Mission (3)
Let's go, we can do this.
That's going to be difficult, sorry.
Overloading with magic...
Recovering Energy
Is there a way to restore Serija's energy?
I think my work here is done, goodbye.
Where is the Goddess
Blood Begets Blood
I'll defeat them.
Dwindling Energy
I'll be right back.
Less Eyes to See
Dangerous Encounter (1)
Dangerous Encounter (2)
Let's meet there.
I don't know where.
Dangerous Encounter (3)
I'll activate it.
Kupole in the Darkness (1)
Let's go in.
I'm too scared.
Kupole in the Darkness (2)
I don't think that's going to work.
Deranged Goddess (1)
I don't want to do that, I'm scared.
Deranged Goddess (2)
I don't think that'll be worth much.
Deranged Goddess (3)
Abducted Goddess
The wounds look serious.
Despite Urgent Matters
Too Late Already
Before It's Too Late (1)
It's okay, I'll find Goddess Dalia.
I don't think I can find traces of the goddess.
Before It's Too Late (2)
That doesn't sound very useful.
They Hid Her (1)
I can do it.
I don't think so.
They Hid Her (2)
I don't have the power to do that.
They Hid Her (3)
I'll give it a try.
Is that even possible?
Transmitting read memories...
They Hid Her (4)
It will be hard to do it in these conditions.
I'll save the goddess with Medena.
They Hid Her (5)
Just wait a while.
Purifying the energy...
With the Power of the Goddess (1)
We should leave right away.
Let's rest first; then we can leave.
Explaining about the Demon Kings and asking what to do
Let me tell you what happened at Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.
With the Power of the Goddess (2)
I'll find it and repair it.
Just wait a little longer.
One Final Step
We should leave right away.
Let's go a bit later.
Showing the orb and relaying Saule's instructions...
Persistent Creatures
Nah, that won't happen.
Evil Talismans
No way that's going to happen.
Preemptive Defense
I'll close as much as I can.
I think we should stop here.
Reducing Numbers
The Place of the Hidden Goddess
Let's just look anywhere.
We should reduce the demons' numbers first.
Before the Demon King Arrives (1)
Is there any way we can do it?
Let's just give up on it.
Before the Demon King Arrives (2)
Before the Demon King Arrives (3)
I'm scared.
Destroying the evil statue...
Unexpected Weapon
Let's activate them.
Activating the exorcising device dealt a great amount of damage to the demons!
Powerful Being (1)
Powerful Being (2)
The Goddess' Sacrifice (1)
Use the Divine Orb.
Don't use the Divine Orb.
The Goddess' Sacrifice (2)
Be strong.
I'll wait until you've calmed down.
Her Last Words
Inserting the spirit...
Extremely Humanly
I'll solve it.
Hilda is back.{nl}Return to the Kupoles.
A Mediator is Born (2)
I'll go a bit later.
A Mediator is Born (3)
Let me have some rest first.
Plot Twist (1)
But what Aeglei said makes sense too.
I think Lina is right.
Plot Twist (2)
Are you fighting because of the leaves?
I keep hearing two Kupoles speaking from the same body.
Making the Magic Sphere (1)
I'll think about it.
Making the Magic Sphere (2)
What's the glimmering powder?
Kupole in Danger
Talk to Kupole Medena at Khonot Forest
Kupole Medena has a favor to ask of you. Talk to her.
Talk to Kupole Medena at Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 1
Medena seeks your help to deal with the demons invading Tevhrin Stalactite Cave. Meet her there.
Talk to Kupole Medena
Talk to Kupole Medena at Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.
Defeat the Demons Attacking the Cave
According to Kupole Medena, more and more demons are attacking, joined by the Tala tribe. Defeat them.
You have defeated the demons and the Tala as Medena requested. Talk to her.
The Legend of the Goddess' Seal
You have defeated the demons and monsters as requested by Medena. Talk to her.
Go to the Teleportation Magic Circle
Kupole Medena thinks the demons are seeking the power of the sealed goddess. Go to the Teleportation Magic Circle and check on the condition of the goddess.
Kupole Medena thinks the magic circle looks strange. She wants you to speak to Kupole Trija, who manages the Teleportation Magic Circle.
Talk to Kupole Trija
Kupole Trija is in charge of the Teleportation Magic Circle that leads to the goddess. Talk to her.
Collect the Pieces of the Broken Magic Core

Kupole Trija says the Magic Core of the Teleportation Magic Circle was shattered by attacking demons. In order to repair the core and use the magic circle again, she needs you to collect the pieces of the broken magic core.
You have collected all the pieces of the magic core requested by Kupole Trija. Talk to her.
To the Goddess' Refuge
You have collected all pieces of the broken magic core. Talk to Kupole Trija.
Gather the Scattered Magic
Kupole Trija says the magic inside the core scattered when it broke. She believes the magic was absorbed by the demons and wants you to get it back by defeating Green Flaks.
The scattered magic was impossible to catch, but you did get some demon essence. Take it to Kupole Trija.
Defeat Green Flaks to Collect the Scattered Magic
Defeat Green Flaks
You gave Kupole Trija the demon essence you collected. Keep talking to her.
Purify the Demons' Evil Essence

Kupole Trija says you can purify the evil energy of demon essence at the Altar of Purification. She warns you that the essence can be destroyed in the process of purification, in which case you will need to collect more from Green Flaks.
You have purified the demon essence as Kupole Trija requested. Go back to her.
You have given Kupole Trija the purified demon essence. Keep talking to her.
Protect Kupole Trija Restoring the Magic Circle
Kupole Trija believes the demons might attack while she's restoring the magic circle and asks you to protect her.
The magic circle looks finished now. Talk to Kupole Trija.
Constant Interference
The power of the magic circle is slowly coming back, but it might be too soon to use it. Talk to Kupole Medena.
Go to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 2
Kupole Medena believes the demons are already looking for Goddess Dalia. Go with Medena to Section 2 of Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.
Someone seems to have blocked the path to Section 2.
Someone seems to have blocked the way to Section 2. Talk to Kupole Medena.
Kupole Medena wants to use the magic circle's core to blow up the pile of carts blocking the way. She believes you can overload it with divine energy to create an explosion.
Convince Kupole Trija and Get the Magic Core
Kupole Trija doesn't seem to want to give you the restored magic core. Talk to her.
Use the Magic Core to Clear the Path
Kupole Trija is going to overload the unstable magic core with divine energy in front of the pile of carts blocking the way to blow them up.
The explosion of the unstable magic core has cleared the way. Move onto the next section.
Brainwashed Tribe
Kupole Trija seems to have something to ask you. Talk to her.
Obtain Tala Tribe Necklaces

Kupole Trija says the necklaces of the Tala have turned black, but can be purified to turn them good again. Use the sleep powder to sedate the Tala and obtain their necklaces. The sleep powder can be used on targets with HP under 50%.
You have obtained the Tala necklaces. Return to Kupole Trija.
Steal the Tala's Necklaces
You have collected the Tala's necklaces and given them to Kupole Trija. Talk to her.
Purify the Tala Necklaces
Kupole Trija believes the Tala necklaces can be purified by the energy of the Altar of Purification. Go there and purify the necklaces.
You have purified the Tala necklaces as requested by Kupole Trija. Talk to her.
You have purified the Tala necklaces as requested by Kupole Trija. Talk to her.
Place the Purified Necklaces Back on the Tala
Kupole Trija has asked you to return the purified necklaces to the Tala tribe. She believes you can put them on after you overpower them.
The Tala tribe seems to have returned to their senses now that they have their necklaces back. Report to Kupole Trija.
Weakening Aura
You and Medena have arrived in Section 2. Talk to Medena.
Look for the Other Kupole
Kupole Medena feels the energy of another Kupole. She feels it weaken and believes the Kupole in question might be in danger. Help her save the endangered Kupole.
Talk to Kupole Alena
You found Kupole Alena being held captive by the demons. Talk to her.
Kupole Alena is being restrained by evil magic. Talk to Kupole Alena to save her.
Kupole Alena believes that defeating the monsters watching her will weaken the binding magic. Defeat the Tala and demons monsters around her.
You have the defeated the monsters around Kupole Alena. Talk to her.
Another Kupole
You succeeded in saving Alena, but Medena feels the energy of another Kupole. Talk to Kupole Alena.
Search for Another Kupole
Kupole Alena has asked you to rescue Kupole Serija. Medena believes the energy she feels belongs to Serija and wants your help to search for her.
You and Medena seem to have found Kupole Serija. Talk to Medena.
Talk to Kupole Serija
You have found Kupole Serija. Talk to her.
Kupole Serija's confinement has made her weaker. Talk to her to find out you can rescue her.
Kupole Rescue Mission
Kupole Medena seems to have thought of something after listening to Serija. Talk to her.
Medena believes Kupole Serija is being confined by the unknown devices she saw on the way to find Serija. She wants to destroy the devices herself.
Kupole Medena used her divine energy on the restraining device to destroy it. Talk to Medena.
You have destroyed the first restraining device. Talk to Kupole Medena.
Destroy the Second Restraining Device
Kupole Medena wants to destroy the second restraining device. Observe the restraining device.
You defeated the attacking demons and destroyed the second restraining device. Talk to Kupole Medena.
According to Kupole Medena, a single restraining device is left now. Talk to her.
Obtain Demon Magic Stones

An unknown energy seems to be protecting the restraining device. Kupole Medena wants to overload the device using the power of the demons' magic stones. Defeat Green Flammes to obtain their magic stones.
Destroy the Third Restraining Device
You have collected all the magic stones. Use the demons' evil energy on the last device.
Defeat Green Flammes to Collect %s
You have destroyed all restraining devices. Talk to Kupole Medena.
Obtain Materialized Recovery
Kupole Medena says there is a Holy Place of Recovery in the caves. She asks you to materialize the healing energy there and bring it to Serija.
You have successfully obtained the materialized healing energy. Deliver it to Kupole Serija.
Obtain %s
Serija seems to feel better now thanks to the materialized recovery. Talk to her.
Go to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 3
After her recovery, Kupole Serija now wants to find Goddess Dalia to make sure She is safe. Meet her in Section 3 with Kupole Medena.
Kupole Alena seems to have something to ask you. Talk to her.
Alena finds it hard to forgive the monsters that attacked Tevhrin Stalactite Cave and harmed the Kupoles. She doesn't want to regret sparing their lives and asks you to defeat them.
You have defeated the monsters as requested by Alena.
Kupole Alena seems to have something to ask you. Talk to her.
Gather Recovering Energy
Kupole Alena has lost too much of her power protecting her section from the demon attacks. Bring her some materialized recovering energy from the Holy Place of Recovery.
You have collected the recovering energy. It looks a little odd, but deliver it to Alena.
Materialized Recovery
You have found Kupole Serija at Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 3. Talk to her.
Kupole Serija thinks the watchful demons forces could jeopardize your mission. Before finding the goddess, she asks you to reduce their numbers by defeating them.
You have defeated all onlooking demons nearby. Return to Kupole Serija.
Dangerous Encounter
You have reduced the demons' numbers as requested by Kupole Serija. Ask her what to do next.

Kupole Serija believes the darkness surrounding the goddess would be difficult to endure for a human. You must first receive the protection of her magic circles. You can receive the protective magic by standing on each circle.
You have received the protective magic of the magic circles. Talk to Kupole Serija.
You're back to Serija after receiving the protective magic of her magic circles. Talk to her.
Go to the Goddess Seal
Kupole Serija has asked you to meet her by the place where the Goddess seal is. You should go before the protective magic wears out, or you'll have to restore it at Protas Sanctum.
You have reached Serija with the protective magic intact. Talk to her.
Serija has asked the Kupole in charge of the Goddess Seal site to undo the seal, but received no answer. Talk to her.
Activate the Lockout Device
Kupole Serija has asked you to activate the Lockout Devices in order to manually release the seal. Remember, however, that you need to activate each device within one minute of each other.
You have succeeded in activating all the lockout devices in time. Talk to Kupole Serija.
Kupole in the Darkness
You have succeeded in activating all lockout devices. Tak to Kupole Serija.
Purify the Kupole in the Darkness
After disabling the barrier, Kupole Siute appeared. She is surrounded by darkness, but she may be able to be purified with the power of the savior. Talk to her.
For some inexplicable reason, the darkness surrounding Kupole Siute disappeared as soon as you lay your hand on her. Talk to Kupole Serija.
For some inexplicable reason, the darkness surrounding Kupole Siute disappeared as soon as you lay your hand on her. Talk to Kupole Serija.
Assist the Kupoles' Purification Ceremony
Kupole Serija believes your power could help purify the darkness taking over the goddess. Help her complete the purification ceremony by lending her your power.
The purification ceremony seems to have been successful. Talk to Kupole Serija.
Deranged Goddess
Goddess Dalia seems to have come back to her senses. Talk to Kupole Serija.
Talk to Goddess Dalia
Serija is glad the goddess has come back to her senses with your help and asks you to speak to her.
Goddess Dalia has explained to you what happened before she lost her senses. Talk to her.
After hearing your conversation with Goddess Dalia, Kupole Serija wants to ask you a favor. Talk to her.
Gather the Mysterious Moss
The Tevhrin Stalactite Cave is imbued with divine energy and so is the moss that grows there. Collect some of this mysterious moss to use its divine energy.
The lockout devices give out divine energy, which seeps into the ground and the moss that grows around them. Collect some of this mysterious moss to use its divine energy.
Return to Kupole Serija
You have collected all of the moss requested by Kupole Serija. Go back to her.
The sound of Serija screaming is suddenly heard echoing somewhere. Hurry and go to her.
Goddess Dalia has disappeared in front of your eyes. Ask Serija about the demons that took the goddess.
Defeat Starlakhan
The demons have got Goddess Dalia. Talk to Kupole Serija.
Go to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 4
Kupole Serija ran off to Section 4 of Tevhrin Stalactite Cave before you could do anything. Hurry and go after her.
Talk to Kupole Siute
Kupole Siute seems to want to ask you something. Talk to Siute.
Siute doesn't think she can handle the monsters in Section 3, given her condition. She asks you to defeat the monsters on your way to meet Serija.
Kupole Siute seems to want to ask you something. Talk to her.
Recharge the Protective Magic

Siute believes it was the lack of protective magic on her pendant that made her vulnerable to the darkness. She asks you to recharge her pendant with protective magic before  moving on to the next section.
You have restored the protective magic on Siute's pendant. Return the pendant to her.
Before It's Too Late
You have followed Serija to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 4. Talk to Kupole Serija.
Search for Goddess Dalia
Kupole Serija is too weak to search for the goddess herself. Help her by looking for the demons that took Goddess Dalia.
There are no traces of the goddess so far. Talk to Kupole Medena.
You were unable to find Goddess Dalia, but in the process you discovered a strange portal. Talk to Kupole Medena.
Destroy the Demon Portal
Medena believes the demons are using the portal to infiltrate Tevhrin Stalactite Cave. She wants to destroy the portal to prevent them from interfering with your search.
There are still no signs of the goddess, but you have destroyed the demons' portal. Report back to Serija.
They Hid Her
You're back after destroying the demon portal. Talk to Kupole Serija.
Obtain Green Zolem Cores

Kupole Serija wants to read the memories of defeated demons to find out the whereabouts of the goddess. She is going to use the cores of Green Zolems to avoid being affected by the demons' spirits, which are incompatible with hers.
You have collected the Green Zolem cores as instructed by Kupole Serija. Talk to her.
You have collected the Green Zolem cores as instructed by Kupole Serija. Talk to her.
Protect Kupole Serija
Kupole Serija is going to purify the evil energy of the cores you collected. The divine energy used to purify them could attract monsters, in which case you will need to protect her.
Kupole Serija has successfully purified the Zolem cores. Talk to her.
Kupole Serija has successfully purified the Zolem cores. Talk to her.
Use the Purified Zolem Cores to Collect Demon Memories
Kupole Serija believes using the purified Zolem cores on the demons will make them absorb their evil demon energy.  Medena is going to read their memories while you defeat them.
The demons' memories contained a clue to the goddess' whereabouts. Dalia is apparently in Section 5. Report to Serija.
The demons' memories revealed that Goddess Dalia was taken to Section 5. Talk to Kupole Serija.
Move to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 5
After finding out where the goddess is, Kupole Serija does not want to waste any more time. She feels too weak to go herself, but she wants you to go with Medena and rescue Dalia.
A crowd of demons coming from a portal ambushed you on your way to Section 5. Talk to Medena.
You have defeated the demons coming from the portal. Talk to Kupole Medena.
Go to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 5
Kupole Medena fears that the demons will keep attempting to attack. She knows there is no time to waste, however, so she wants to hurry and carry on with the plan.
Medena is in pain after absorbing a demon spirit. Purify the evil energy surrounding her.
Defeat the Demons That Abducted the Goddess
With the Power of the Goddess
You have purified the dark energy taking over Kupole Medena. Talk to her.
Medena can feel a great malicious energy getting closer to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave. Report this to Kupole Serija.
Kupole Serija's divine orb is too weak to use against the demons. She believes the orb would be useful if imbued with the power of its creator, Goddess Saule.
The divine orb of Goddess Saule has lost its power. Go to Saule for help.
Absorb Saule's Power
Saule feels like her powers haven't been completely restored yet. She believes, however, that you can obtain her energy from the Forest of Thorns, where she was held captive, and add it to the orb.
You have recharged the divine orb with Saule's energy. Return to Goddess Saule.
You have recharged the divine orb with Saule's energy. Talk to Goddess Saule.
The divine orb requested by Serija is now complete. The orb itself is still weak, however, and can therefore only be used once. Return to Kupole Serija.
Kupole Serija seems to have something to say to you. Talk to her.
Kupole Serija seems to have accepted the decision of the goddess. She worries that the remaining demons will occupy Tevhrin Stalactite Cave. Defeat the demons for her.
Defeat Green Zolems
Kupole Serija seems to have something to ask you. Talk to her.
Collect Evil Talismans
Kupole Serija believes the evil talismans used by the demons are affecting the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave. She asks you to take their talismans.
You have collected the demons' evil talismans. Return to Kupole Serija.
Defeat Demon Monsters and Collect %s
Destroy the Demon Portal
Kuple Serija believes the demons are still using portals located around Section 4 to infiltrate Tevhrin Stalactite Cave. She asks you to destroy their portals.
You have destroyed the demon portals. Return to Kupole Serija.
You have arrived at Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 5, where Goddess Dalia is. Talk to Kupole Medena.
Medena worries that the demons occupying Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 5 will try to stop you from rescuing Dalia. Defeat these demons before finding the goddess.
You have defeated the demons in Section 5. Ask Kupole Medena about the next step in your plan.
You have defeated the demons wandering in Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 5. Talk to Kupole Medena.
Kupole Medena is certain about the goddess' whereabouts. Go find Dalia together.
You seem to have found the place where the goddess lies. Talk to Kupole Medena.
Before the Demon King Arrives
You have found the location where the goddess is thought to be, but a barrier stops you from advancing. Talk to Kupole Medena.
Speak to Goddess Dalia Through Kupole Medena
Kupole Medena wants to confirm where the goddess is by communicating with Her. If Dalia is close, you will be able to speak with her through Medena.
You have spoken with Goddess Dalia. You must help her before she loses her senses. Talk to Kupole Medena.
Goddess Dalia feels something in Section 5 is forcing evil energy onto Her. Talk to Kupole Medena.
Kupole Medena hasn't seen any objects of evil energy around. She believes there are evil statues hidden by demon magic and wants to find them using a Magic Searching Stone.
You have found all the hidden evil statues. Talk to Kupole Medena.
You have found and destroyed all hidden evil statues. Talk to Kupole Medena.
Find the Source of Powerful Energy
Kupole Medena feels an unknown source of powerful energy nearby. Go with her and find out the origin of this energy.
Destroy the Last Evil Statue
You have defeated the Lavenzard. Destroy the last evil statue.
You have destroyed all the evil statues and their strange evil energy is no longer felt. Talk to Kupole Medena.
Activate the Auxiliary Devices

There are auxiliary devices assisting the cave's main exorcising device. These secondary devices must be activated in order to use it. However, each auxiliary device must be turned on one minute after the previous one, or they will all be disabled.
Start the Exorcising Device
The exorcising device seems to have been activated now. Go and check the device.
Powerful Being
Activating the exorcising device has dealt a great amount of damage to the demons. Ask Medena about what to do next.
The path to Goddess Dalia opened up after the evil statues were destroyed. Talk to Dalia.
Talk to Demon Queen Gesti
You succeeded in defeating Gesti after she tried to take over Dalia. Talk to Goddess Dalia.
Examine Demon Queen Gesti
Gesti is collapsed on the ground. Check on her condition.
Gesti has released the seal of Goddess Dalia. Talk to Dalia.
The Goddess' Sacrifice
Goddess Dalia has managed to subdue Gesti with the power of the Kupoles. Talk to Goddess Dalia.
Defeat Demon Queen Gesti
Gesti is attacking once again. Defeat her.
Goddess Dalia has sacrificed Herself to eradicate Gesti. Talk to Medena.
Goddess Dalia has sacrificed Herself to eradicate Gesti. Talk to Medena.
Comfort Kupole Medena
Kupole Medena is grieving for Goddess Dalia's sacrifice. Talk to her.
Kupole Medena seems to have something to ask you. Talk to her.
Search for Dalia's Scattered Spirit
Medena believes Dalia's spirit was scattered after the final blow. Look for the pieces of Her spirit before it disappears.
Talk to Dalia's Spirit
You have collected all the fragments of Dalia's spirit. Combine them to speak with the goddess.
Talk to Refugee Hilda
Hilda seems anxious, not knowing what to do. Ask her what's wrong.
Kupole Aeglei seems to have a favor to ask you. Talk to her.
Investigate Bethez Refuge and Tjibes Refuge
Kupole Aeglei is worried that Lina has done something wrong again and asks you to check Bethez Refuge and Tjibes Refuge.
You have investigated all the locations requested by Kupole Aeglei. Report back to her.
Kupole Aeglei seems to have thought of something. Talk to her.
Dispose of the Supplements in Pharaz Vacant Lot
Kupole Aeglei believes Lina will have stored her supplements at the Pharaz Vacant Lot and asks you to dispose of them.
You have disposed of all of Kupole Lina's supplements. Report back to Kupole Aeglei.
You have disposed of all of Kupole Lina's supplements as requested by Kupole Aeglei. It didn't feel very right, despite it being a favor for Aeglei. Go and talk to Lina.
Kupole Lina feels strange. Try talking to her again.
Kupoles Lina and Aeglei turned out to be the same person - an unexpected development. Talk to them to try and find out what happened.
The situation with Kupoles Lina and Aeglei is still confusing.{nl}Ask them about it.
Kupoles Lina and Aeglei's problem seems to have reached some closure now.{nl}Confirm what you found out with them.
Kupole Lina seems to have a favor to ask of you. Talk to her.
Obtain Rodejokel Essence
Kupoles Lina and Aeglei are trying to complete a magic sphere. They want you to collect Rodejokel essence to use as material for the sphere.
You have collected the Rodejokel essence requested by Lina and Aeglei. Take the essence to Kupole Lina.
Kupoles Lina and Aeglei require one more material for their magic sphere. Talk to Kupole Lina.
Collect Glimmering Powder
Kupoles Lina and Aeglei need some glimmering powder to complete their magic sphere. Collect some for Kupole Aeglei.
You have collected the glimmering powder requested by Kupoles Lina and Aeglei.
Thank you for helping out. {nl}You've reduced my workload quite a bit.
Ah, it won't be effective to ones who have already been blessed, so please keep that in mind.{nl}Ashaq Underground Prison and Crystal Mine are included, too.
I heard you defeated Ebonypawn.{nl}I'm sorry you had to do something that should be my responsibility, I'm not quite sure how to feel about it.
{nl}In any case, thank you.
Was the Formine Armor useful?{nl}Actually, the Formine Armor was originally made for me by Mr. Juan over there.
{nl}He made them for free, although he did complain about the materials.{nl}Still, Mr. Juan wanted to get all the materials himself then give away the finished armors.
{nl}But Mr. Juan isn't so young anymore... He fell ill trying to make all those armors and had to stop.{nl}Then... he left me with the armors and passed away.
The records you are holding at the moment.{nl}Let me have alook.
{nl}The Namu Temple Ruins...this record was there, you say?{nl}This information is much more valuable than we thought.
{nl}This warrants further investigation. Until then I cannot say much.
{nl}I will hold my silence until we have certainty.
The tombstone is up. Now to write a few words of praise to the victims.
Os monstros continuam aparecendo.{nl}Mesmo que derrotemos milhares, será que diminuiria mesmo os números?
{nl}De qualquer forma, não temos o poder militar para resolver isso em Orsha...
My friends and I made friendship badges.{nl}We were at the Pelke Shrine Ruins with the badges when a huge monster appeared, so we ran away.
We lost some of the badges while we were running away.{nl}I wanted to go find them, but I'm scared of the monsters so I gave up.
In hard times, it's only natural to miss those dear to you...{nl}Justina must miss her family a lot...
So it's true, flower branches really are mesmerizing.{nl}They're definitely different from any accessory I've ever seen.
{nl}It's the first time I see an accessory so beautiful but mysterious at the same time.{nl}If you don't mind, may I look at them for a little longer?
Thank you for letting me have another look at them.
They truly are ethereal.{nl}To think a simple couple of branches and flowers could be so fascinating...
The people of our village must be worried for us, still living here at the Mosteiro Novaha.{nl}Especially Anne, who was always with me... She must be so worried...
Rose is writing a letter.
I need to write Anne a letter.{nl}Please wait.
Anne is writing a letter to Rose and her brother.
Here.{nl}Please deliver this letter to Anne.
I'm glad to hear Rose and Edmundas are okay.{nl}When Edmundas was taken by the demons, I really...
{nl}I should write back to Rose and Edmundas.{nl}Just a moment.
Anne is very kind and thoughtful, I'm sure she's even more worried about us.
Please take this letter to Rose.
Anne has a crush on someone!{nl}Wow, to think the little girl I knew now likes someone...
{nl}As a big sister, I should hear her out and comfort her but...{nl}At least I now know how she is doing.
And please don't read the letter on your way there.
That sword pell... It was hard enough to make, I can't afford to lose it.{nl}I've been so busy lately I don't even know if I would have time to make another one.
It does look broken beyond repair though.{nl}I think I really need a new one.
{nl}I'm going to give you the tools to make the pell, so you can gather the materials and make a new one.
I know it's a pell meant for training, but try not to hit it too hard.
Your companion has grown a lot, I see.{nl}It's almost like family now, huh?
Sometimes it's good to make food for your companion, you know.{nl}It'll be more loyal to you if you feed it something your made yourself.
Do you wanna try and make some food for your companion?
I assume it's your first time making food for your companion, so I'll give you a bag with the cooking tools.{nl}There's a recipe and a few ingredients. Should be enough.{nl}
Oh, right. I don't think there's any Raffly Leaves or Ellogua Flower Wine in there.{nl}You'll have to get those yourself.
So? Does your companion like the food?{nl}I bet it does, you made it yourself after all.
Revelator, so nice to see you again!
What have you been doing? I can't wait to know...{nl}Come on, tell me all about your new adventures!
Mihail looks filled with expectation.
Last time someone broke this sword pell. I did make a new one but...
You've had an audience with Goddess Gabija in Mage Tower and Goddess Vakarine in the Demon Prison?{nl}My word...{nl}
I'm glad to hear the goddesses are safe.
Did you defeat 1000 monsters?{nl}Their numbers seem to have reduced a little, but they're still many.{nl}
I should send a report to Orsha.{nl}I'll collect some more information.
{nl}Would you be so kind as to deliver the report to Orsha for me?
This report...?{nl}It was sent by the agent in Woods of the Linked Bridges.{nl}
Irei lê-lo agora.
A Lorde de Orsha está lendo o relatório.
It seems eliminating even 1000 monsters didn't too much to reduce their numbers...{nl}We need to find a solution to protect the areas around Orsha from the monsters.
Lost Spirit
My ring... The ring I exchanged with Sarah for our wedding vows...{nl}Thank you for finding it.{nl}
I can go in peace now.{nl}But, where do I go...?
Oh, if you guide me to the Owl Statue, I'll gladly follow.
Some spirits are still attached to a lost object and end up staying behind.{nl}They'll linger behind until their belongings are found.
Thanks to you, another wandering spirit is now going home.
Device Note
Good find.{nl}You read all my notes, right?
Put the amount of all the foods we ate in order: that's the code to open the locking device.
Those are the friendship badges I made with my friends!{nl}We were playing at the Pelke Shrine Ruins when we saw a huge monster and ran away without the badges.
{nl}I thought I had lost them forever, I'm so glad to have them back.{nl}But I'm afraid some of the badges are still missing; would you please find them for me?
I don't know what monster it is.{nl}The only thing I can tell you is that it's huge.
You found them all.{nl}Thank you so much.
Espírito de Gintas
Minha única esperança... ninguém mais será vítima das mentiras da Ordem da Árvore da Verdade de novo.
{nl}Eu sei que Margiris estava mantendo uma lista das atividades da Order em algum lugar.{nl}Ache essa lista e entregue ao Mestre Inquisitor, faça com que as pessoas saibam o que houve aqui.
O Mestre Inquisitor saberá o que fazer.
Estas são as anotações da Tree of Truth, uma ordem operando em Carlyle's Mausoleum?{nl}Tantos espíritos foram mortos por causa deles...
{nl}Eu preciso garantir que nenhuma vida a mais será sacrificada por essa heresia.{nl}Obrigado pela sua dedicação.
Os Ferrets já pegaram nossa comida, agora os itens de oferenda da vila...
Estes Ferrets nojentos roubariam qualquer coisa.{nl}Obrigado por trazer nossos itens de oferenda de volta.
{nl}Finalmente poderemos fazer uma cerimônia correta.
Nós queremos acalmar os espíritos das vítimas de Novaha.{nl}Mas o Monastery está lotado de monstros, não conseguimos nem erguer uma lápide.
{nl}Será que... Você poderia fazer o memorial em Novaha Assembly Hall para nós?
Muito obrigado!{nl}Nós sempre lembraremos deles, e vamos garantir que ninguém mais tenha o mesmo destino.
Eu preciso ir ver Justina, diga-a o que aconteceu aqui e as últimas palavras de Gailus Legwyn.
Eu deveria te poupar da inconveniência e ir eu mesmo, mas...{nl}Vou contar com você para isso.
Meu pai disse...?{nl}... Você poderia... Por favor, me deixe sozinha um pouco...
{nl}Ah...{nl}Me sinto um pouco chocada ao saber das últimas palavras de meu pai...
Você diz que os Ferrets estão com as itens?{nl}Nós estávamos procurando por todos os lugares!
{nl}Hm... não sei se é pedir muito, mas você poderia encontrar os outros itens de oferenda?{nl}Precisamos dela para a oferenda de paz na nossa vila.
{nl}Podemos dizer que estes itens são o que mantém nossa vila segura por todos estes anos, entende.
{nl}A tribo Tala se juntou a eles e estão causando caos.{nl}Acredito ser melhor reduzir seus números primeiro.
Isto não chega.{nl}A tribo Tala e os demônios continuam causando caos e não tem nada que podemos fazer.{nl}Estou preocupada que eles já tenham quebrado o selo da Deusa.
Obrigado pela ajuda.
foi completado.{nl}Manter um controle é uma tarefa muito importante.{nl}
Precisamos ter livros registros úteis para manter ao longo do tempo.
Eu vou lidar com os monstros.
Olhares Incomuns
Eu te mostrarei o Flower Branch
Boas Novas
Eu levo as notícias.
Eu tenho outras coisas para fazer.
Entregando a carta da Rose...
Entregando a carta da Anne..
Restaurar o Boneco de Treino (1)
Eu fui responsável por isso e vou reparar
Não faço ideia do que você está falando. Adeus.

Como você está?
Contando suas histórias...
Monstros após Monstros
Eu levarei o relatório para a Lorde.
Você mesmo deveria reportar a ela.
Eu trarei espíritos para a Frail Owl Sculpture.
Trazer os espíritos perdidos para a Frail Owl Sculpture.

Eu vou abrir.
A caixa está fechada com um dispositivo.{nl}Encontre uma forma de abrir.
Olhando o conteúdo da caixa...

Vou achar o livro de Margiris.
Relatando os eventos de Carlyle's Mausoleum...

Notícias Inesperadas
Eu vou até a Squire Master.

Aliança Comercial Kedora está ajudando novos Reveladores. Utilize o Kedora Merchant Alliance Scroll nos novos Reveladores que estão entre os níveis 1 e 25 perto de Orsha, Klaipeda ou Crystal Mine. Entretanto, você não pode usa-lo em Reveladores que já receberam estes benefícios.
Derrote os Monstros que Atacam a Caverna
Enquanto a Kupole Medena estava distante, o número de demônios aumentou muito, junto com a tribo Tala. Destrua-os
Você derrotou os demônios, os Tala e demais monstros, como Medena pediu. Fale com ela.

Estes demônios nos ameaçaram depois que o disfarce foi descoberto e você nos salvou.{nl}Com certeza a sua vinda é a vontade da Deusa.{nl}Muito obrigado.
As pessoas de Nestospa sabem sobre Albinas?{nl}Eu imagino que teriam vindo para cá no mesmo instante...{nl}
Eu estou furioso e irritado! {nl}Se tivéssemos chegado mais cedo, não teríamos sido totalmente dizimados... {nl}
Querido Revelador, eu tenho um favor para te pedir. {nl}Você poderia recuperar os itens dos meus companheiros?
Já é ruim o suficiente eles acabarem mortos pelos Vubbes,{nl}mas até seus pertences estão sendo usados.{nl}Que horrível...
Meu Deus! Os Vubbes roubaram todo o nosso estoque de comida. {nl}Eles levaram até o que tínhamos para hoje... Por favor, nos ajude! precisamos de sua força!
Muito obrigado.{nl}Esta quantidade nos ajudará pelos próximos dias, pelo menos.
Obrigado pela ajuda de antes, mas ainda tem mais itens que precisamos reaver. {nl}Meus companheiros não irão descansar em paz sem eles...{nl}
Então nos ajude, por favor. {nl}Se você puder recuperar os itens restantes para nós, nós iremos te retribuir.
Obrigado por trazer estes itens de volta, mas ainda não é o suficiente... {nl} Me desculpe... {nl}
Nós sobrevivemos ao perigo eminente graças à sua ajuda, mas ainda precisamos de mais suporte. {nl}Você poderia nos ajudar mais um pouco?
Muito obrigado. {nl}Ainda necessitamos de mais, mas pelo menos reavemos estes por enquanto.
Muito obrigado. {nl}Ainda necessitamos de mais, mas pelo menos reavemos estes por enquanto.

Não posso sair no momento por causa dos meus estudos, mas avise-os que ajudar na pesquisa.
Você deveria pensar seriamente onde deseja focar a partir de agora.{nl}Não é uma tarefa fácil.

If I wasn't for the migration order from Orsha, I may have been wandering, homeless.{nl}{nl}
Are you doing the instanced dungeon tutorial?

Revelator Pudhin
Hm...?{nl}I meet many different people here due to unexpected circumstances.
Are you, by chance, a Revelator?{nl}Did you come because you also heard the rumors about Goddess Jurate and the Loremasters?{nl}
After Medzio Diena, rumors spread that the sea turned to land and demons appeared.{nl}And, to protect Goddess Jurate's domain, her priests also appeared.
I heard these rumors and came here to help the Loremasters of Goddess Jurate defeat the demons.{nl}I was delivering the necessary supplies.{nl}
But as I was moving the supplies, monsters appeared and took them and now I'm not sure what to do.{nl}If you are a Seguidor of Goddess Jurate, would you mind lending me a hand?
Thank you.{nl} I will look around Husk Bridge, so please check if the monsters went another way.
Please be quick.{nl}As the number of demons increase so does the need for supplies. Everyone is becoming weary.
Oh you found them all.{nl}I was starting to get worried when I found nothing around Husk Bridge...{nl}
Thank goodness.
Hm...?{nl} You would like to know exactly what happened here?
Recently there were talks of an appearance by Goddess Jurate at Igyti Seashore.{nl} After that, to carry out the Goddess' meaning, Loremaster's began appearing around the Coral Plains.{nl}

And upon hearing this news, Revelators also gathered to help Goddess Jurate and the Loremasters.{nl} In this place, demons trying to take Goddess Jurate domain have appeared and are creating quite the headache.

Recently Loremasters with the strength of the Revelators are forcing the demons out.{nl} But the demons have placed suspicious devices here and there on the coast thus accelerating their return.{nl} If the rumors are correct, other coasts and the Coral Plains are also under attack.
This area's Loremasters also heard Goddess Jurate's words and were fired up to fight, but it's still a difficult battle.
If you go a little further down, in Mopuli Lowlands is Ugnius, the leader of this area's Loremasters.{nl}Meeting with him would be good.
Ah, the road ahead is filled with savage monsters so please be careful.{nl}But if you are able to clear the road of them, I would be thankful.
Loremaster Ugnius
This is where I meet with others. Are you a Revelator?
Please say that you will deliver the supplies to Ugnius.{nl}Then please travel safely.
Ah, you are the Revelator who accepted the request from Pudhin.{nl} Thank you for your help.
Now that I think about it, you seem to be the Revelator that other Loremaster's have talked about..{nl} Are you the Revelator who helped us at Igyti Seashore?{nl}
Yes, you are the Revelator from those rumors.{nl}I heard Berta and Daroul received a great amount of help from you at Igyti Seashore.
Thanks to you we were able to hear Goddess Jurate again.{nl}From the goddess we were told that the demons want to corrupt both Eperotao Coast and Sorfus Coast and in order to make it their own.{nl}
She requested that we get rid of the demons.{nl}And bcause of the help we've received from Revelators, we've been able to fight like this, thus far, but our strength is still lacking.
Recently, as a form of sabotage, the demons destroyed the altar where we performed rituals to Goddess Jurate and this has fatigued us.{nl}
Oh, can you help us?{nl}We would be more than grateful.{nl}
If that's the case, could you carefully check the Sacred Coral Reef?{nl}That's where Goddess Jurate alter is located, but not too long ago it was attacked by demons{nl}

The Loremaster Narius went there to repair the altar but he has yet to return.{nl}Recently, because of the effect from demons, the monster there have become more violent causing us to have a hard time sending someone to bring him back.
So, I ask this of you.{nl}If you could go to the Sacred Coral Reef and check on Loremaster Narius' situation and why he has yet to return, I would be grateful.
Loremaster Narius
Uhg..thank you for helping me.{nl}Thanks to you I'm still alive.
It wasn't supposed to be a difficult task..{nl}After destroying the alter the demons left so without a Revelator's help I went alone, but what happened..
Ah, you are the Revelator sent by Ugnius.{nl}Thanks to you I'm alive.
As I was repairing the alter, monsters suddenly swarmed me and attacked.{nl}When the demons ran away after destroying the alter something seems to have called the monsters to this area.
I'm sorry, but could you help me please?
Then, could you please go back and bring Loremaster Ugnius?{nl}The monsters attacked by legs and I'm bleeding too much to move.{nl}

The bleeding has stopped but I'm still in a difficult spot so please bring Ugnius here.{nl}Because of the monsters I wouldn't advise that he come alone, so please have either you or another Revelator protect him.{nl}
On your way back, please defeat Nimrah Damsels and collect their coral powder. Ugnius can use it to help treat my wounds. {nl}I'm sorry, but I must ask you for this favor.
Hm..?{nl} Narius was attacked by monsters and was wounded?{nl}
This is a problem.{nl}But I'm grateful that you collected Nimrah Damsel coral powder.{nl}
If you sprinkle this powder on the wound and treat it, it helps heal serious injuries.{nl}We use the material from monsters in this area as medicine.
Please hurry.{nl} I ask of you..
There is no time to waste, we must hurry.{nl}Could you please protect this old man until the Sacred Coral Reef?{nl}
The monsters have become more violent and more prone to attack, recently.{nl}I can handle one or two, but if three appear I will be in hot water.
Then I will ask that you help.{nl}Let's move quickly.
Thanks to you, I've finished treating Narius.{nl}At first glance, it may seem that all is well, but due to the loss of blood, he needs to rest a bit more.
Sorry but, in Narius's stead, could you please collect the material needed to perform the ritual?
Then I will ask for your help.{nl}If you go down there you will see Blue Coral.{nl}
Please bring back some.{nl}For regular rituals to the goddesses' we use sacred herbs or tributes as an offering.{nl}
But for Goddess Jurate we usually offer coral or handcrafted coral ornaments.{nl}But, since we are in a rush, first dig up some Blue Coral and we will offer them to the Goddess.
If you dig up and bring back the Blue Coral, I will be thankful.{nl}We must hear the voice of the Goddess again.
Oh, you finished so fast.{nl}Alright, time to prepare the ritual.
Are preparations complete?{nl}I will start the ritual ceremony.
Did you hear the voice of the Goddess?{nl}
{nl}The Goddess asked an important task of you and requested that I help.{nl}You may be a special Revelator, yet.{nl}
Can you go to Aitheo Coast first?{nl}I will watch over Narius' condition until Revelator Pudhin arrives and then follow after you.
Then go first and find Revelator Nichi.{nl}Help her and I will follow soon after.
Revelator Nichi
An ordinary person here? Who are you?{nl}
Revelator, I'm sorry, but can I make a request?{nl}
I was collecting materials to repair the altar, when I noticed demons roaming around Tolata Sandbank.{nl}Demons sometimes appear in Aitheo Coast, but this region was still safe from them.
The area of the destroyed altar and where they appeared in Tolata Sandbank are suspicious.{nl}I'm sorry, but could you investigate that area?
Then I leave that to you.{nl}Please check what those demons are planning at Tolata Sandbank.
They destroyed the altar but what else are they planning...
This Red Crystal..?{nl}
It's emitting an evil energy.{nl}But it's unclear if there is a connection between this and the increase in violent monsters.{nl}
I'll look into this.{nl}Thank you for your help.
Ah, Loremaster Ugnius sent you?{nl}Then you are also a Revelator.{nl}
I'm Revelator Nichi, a helper of the Loremasters.{nl} Here, at the Aitheo Coast, I've been fighting off the demon provoked Nimrah and Varle.
From one day the number of Nimrah and Varle increased, and a suspicious device was set on a corrupted sandbank causing me to think that there is some plan behind this.
Hm..then the objective of the Nimrah and Varle is to occupy this coast.{nl}Because of the sealed Goddess' relics, the demons..{nl}
There is a questionable location.{nl}I'll search one spot so could you check the occupied lowlands?{nl}
There is nothing special about the low lands, but recently the Nimrah have flocked to occupy it.{nl}I'm not sure if that has something to do with all this.
Please clear the occupied lowlands of its patrols and of the Nimrah and Varle that are in the area.{nl} I'll check another location as well.
I'll leave it to you to clear the lowlands of its patrols and of the Nimrah and Varle in the area.{nl}
First we must weaken the evil seal in order to purify the holy relic.{nl} If we use the ocean's energy to awaken the relic's power, we may be able to vanquish the evil aura.
You're back?{nl}I heard from Revelator Nichi.
Hm..They created a magic circle and were performing a ritual ceremony..?{nl}It seems that the holy relic in that area is sealed and suppressed so that we are unable to find it.{nl}
As we investigate another location, could you break the magic circle?{nl} If the demons really are performing a ritual and are suppressing the holy relic, it will not be easy to break.{nl}
Take this with you.{nl}It might prove helpful when breaking the demon's magic circle.{nl}
Be safe.
Of course, it would be best if you found Goddess Jurate's second holy relic.{nl}From what the Goddess says, without it we will not be able to destroy the demon device.
Oh, that's the Goddess' holy relic!{nl}As shown with the sacrifice tools from the ancient records.{nl}
Due to the demons, the Divine Energy was sealed.
If you go to Kite Coral Reef you will find Ancient Coral Rock and Blue Coral.{nl}This Ancient Coral was blessed by Goddess Jurate and carries with it a strong energy from the ocean.

If you take the Sealed Relic there and touch it against the Coral, the energy of the ocean will repel the evil and purify the relic.{nl}But keep in mind that if all of the ocean's energy is released, the Coral will need time to recharge.
I'll leave this to you.{nl}While you are removing the evil from the holy relic, I will prepare the restoration.
You've returned?{nl}Oh, the evil has been completely vanquished from the holy relic!
I'll begin restoring the relic.{nl}While I'm doing that, could you please report back to me about the Corrupted Sandbank?{nl}
The demons could be on the move since we took the sealed relic.
Alright, I'll leave the Corrupted Sandbank in your hands.{nl}There may be attacks against other Revelators as well, so please prepare.{nl}
And it would be a great help if you could cut down the number of Nimrah and Varle in the area.
Carefully examine the situation at the Corrupted Sandbank.{nl}There might be some changes to the Demon Device.
The demons are arriving through a portal?{nl}The demons have set their sights on this area as well.{nl}
It seems the small devices amplify the Kruvina that the Goddess spoke of, which then sends out an evil energy.
The restoration is complete.{nl}The time has come to destroy that Suspicious Device.
You have proven your skill, so you'll come with me to destroy the device.{nl}I will tell the other Revelators to head off any potential disruptions.{nl}
Go to the Corrupted Sandbank first and I'll follow after you.{nl}We'll meet there.
Alright, then I'll meet you at the Corrupted Sandbank.{nl}
The device has be successfully destroyed!{nl}Now the Aitheo Coast corruption must be relieved!
The Demon Device has been destroyed but some parts of the Coast are still corrupted.{nl}We must prepare to purify it.
The Kruvina is also an urgent matter, but if we leave this area like it is the demons may find a way to ambush us.{nl}The purification ceremony doesn't take long, so let's start.
Could you take this bottle to Letave Plateau and bring back some Sea Aura?{nl}And on your way, please dig up some Jurate's Moss to use for the ceremony.
If I ask the other Revelators to find the remaining materials it won't take long.
You just need to bring back Sea Aura and Yulates Moss.{nl}The Plateau is still free from the influnce of demons.
You collected everything so fast.{nl}Thank you.
Preparations for the purification ceremony are complete.{nl}Shall I begin?
You removed the demon army from the Aitheo Coast{nl}Thank you.{nl}
However, Kartas' subordinates have become smarter and swifter. {nl}When Kruvina was activated, Eperotao Coast became overrun with demons.{nl}
Yet, with the help of the two holy relics, the devices protecting the Kruvina can be nullified and the Kruvina, destroyed.{nl}If the corruption accelerates our power will grow weaker.{nl}
Please disrupt Kartas' Plans.
If we are to follow the Goddess, we must be quick.{nl}I'll go on ahead, when you are ready come to Eperotao Coast.
Alright then, I will see you at Eperotao Coast.
Would you mind lending a hand?{nl}Thanks to the purification ceremony the corruption was removed, but parts of the Coast still retains an evil energy.{nl}
I'm planning to purify these areas as well, but doing so alone will take me awhile.{nl}I can finish faster with your help,  so would you mind?
Then take this Coral Talisman.{nl} It was made by Loremaster Ugnius.{nl}
The talisman will direct you towards the evil energy.{nl}Just be careful since there may be demons or monsters waiting to attack.
I'll deal with the other regions so please clear the Husk Reef and the occupied lowlands of its evil energy.
All done?{nl}I also just returned{nl}
Thanks to you I was able to finish in no time.{nl}Now Aitheo Coast is free from corruption.
You still saw some demon forces in the area?{nl}The device was destroyed and the evil energy cleared, but these remnant forces could prove troublesome.
To keep Aitheo Coast safe, I'm planning to drive those forces out. Would you join me?
Well then, please drive out the remaining Nimrah and Varle that are in the Aitheo Coast.{nl}It doesn't matter where.
Then, I will leave this to you.
Thank you.{nl}I will remain here and ensure that Aitheo Coast stays safe.
There's no time to delay.{nl}The Revelators are carefully searching for Demon Devices in other locations.
Did you also come to scout Coral Forest Hill?{nl}There may be a Demon Device there.
Alright, I'll leave that to you.{nl}Go to Coral Forest Hill and report back on the demons and the possible device.
If the demons are using the device as a warp, then they are planning to cross at once.{nl}There's no time.
Hm..the demons have started gathering here as well.{nl}Hurry, the device must be destroyed.{nl}
It may be difficult but it must be done.
The demons have already started to summon their forces.{nl}Things will prove more difficult if we don't destroy that device.{nl}
Just like how the device in Aitheo Coast was destroyed, we must do the same to that one.{nl}It'll be dangerous, but it'll be possible with your skills.
Good.{nl}Then could you please go ahead first and rid the area around the device of its demon forces?{nl}
I will leave dealing with the other device to the other Revelators and Loremaster.{nl}When they return I will explain the situation and join you right after.
Let's meet in front of the device. Be safe.
Thanks to you I arrived safely.{nl}Are you ready?{nl}
Demons will flock here while we are trying to destroy the device.{nl}Just like before, please watch my back.
Thanks to you, the device was safely destroyed.{nl}Now we need to see how the other Revelators and Loremaster fared.{nl}
First, we should make our way to where the other Revelators went.{nl}I'll see you there.
You're here.{nl}The other Revelators and Loremaster went below to deal with the device.
Would you mind helping them?{nl}I also want to go, but the demons are acting strangely so I'm going to scout around first.
Alright, then I have a request.{nl}Since there are already two other Revelators there, everything should finish quite soon.
I would like to ask that you handle another Demon Device.{nl}I, on the other hand, will check the demons' reactions.
Is the Demon Device destroyed?
That's good to hear.{nl}Now that all the devices are gone we can set our sights on the Kruvina.{nl}
But there's a problem.{nl}It looks like the demons have activated a trap.
The path in the direction of the Massive Kruvina is overflowing with an evil energy.{nl}I've experienced a similar situation before.
At that time, the Revelator who tried to remove the concentrated evil energy was badly hurt.{nl}If we continue on like this, reaching the Kruvina will be difficult.
Revelator, there is no one here with greater skill than yourself.{nl}I must ask, could you destroy the evil energy along with the suppressor?{nl}
Take this talisman with you.{nl}This talisman will keep you out of sight of the demons until you are closer.
Okay, I will follow shortly.{nl}We'll meet at Aitheo Coast.
Oh, you've returned?{nl}Seeing as you've returned safely, I can assume it was a success!{nl}
The surrounding area feels as though it's been released from the evil energy.{nl}You completed a dangerous task. Thank you.{nl}
We can now head in the direction of the Massive Kruvina.
Let's make haste.{nl}I feel a strange magic stemming from the area around the Massive Kruvina.
The other Revelators and Loremasters will take care of the incoming demon reinforcements.{nl}And we will go to destroy the Massive Kruvina.
When you are ready, we'll leave.
Without your help, we wouldn't have been able to destroy Kruvina.{nl}With only my divine energy, we may not have been as successful.
Now the only thing left is to restore the Coast to what it was.{nl}This is really all thanks to you.
Hm?
I feel a strange divine energy from the relic!
I must listen to Goddess Jurate and purify this place.{nl}As you travel to other coasts and fight against the demons, I pray that Goddess Jurate keeps you safe.
You have helped Goddess Jurate by saving this coast. Thank you.
Your name will forever be remembered amongst the Loremasters.
Well then, I will collect the other Revelators and Loremasters and meet you at the entrance to the Heart of the Sea.
The Varle will be blocking our way.{nl}But the other Revelators and Loremasters will fight them off so that we will have a chance to destroy the Massive Kruvina.
Loremaster Emmanuelis
Ah, you are the Revelator.{nl}You and Ugnius did well destroying the device.{nl}
During that time, I was monitoring the demon forces.{nl}After the device was destroyed, their movements through the portal also stopped, but it seems many problems still remain.
The broken fragments of the device have been embedded in the soil.{nl}It's unclear what they are up to..{nl}

Ugnius and I were discussing how to purify corruption areas, but we're not sure if this is all connected.{nl}If it's no burden to you, could you collect the fragments buried by the demons and bring them to me?{nl}
If you go to the location of the broken device you'll see shiny red fragments buried in the soil.
Hm, are those fragments fueling the corruption or accelerating it?{nl}Or could be blocking the purification..{nl}
Oh, you collected more than expected!{nl}Thank you!{nl}
This will help us research more about the corruption.
Thanks to you and the other Revelators, the Kartas's plan has been disrupted.{nl}You deferred a potential attack.
However, due to the demons, some areas have fallen under corruption.{nl}The Loremasters are planning to purify these areas, but the water has dried up and bring life back will take time.
I will work harder to prevent this disaster from happening again.{nl}I was the one protecting the ocean from evil...
But now humans are protecting it from the demons working to defile it.{nl}
This is my small gift.{nl}The ocean's blessing will be with you.
It seems that the corruption is seeping into the soil.{nl}When we try to purify the coast the corruption simply returns again.{nl}
Because the fragments are buried deep within the soil, the corruption remains. And digging them all up would be a tiring task.{nl}However, another idea came to mind. Could you help?
The remaining demon forces are preventing us from purifying the coast.{nl}Other Revelators and Loremasters are lending a hand, but the remaining number is too great.{nl}
Would you be willing to help?
Then I have a request.{nl}Unlike the other coasts, this area had the most devices and the most corruption.The number of demons is unbelievable.{nl}
If you can finish off as many demons as possible, I would be grateful.
I'm sorry for giving you a difficult task.
That was fast.{nl}Thank you for your help.{nl}
I need to conduct deeper research on the Demon Device and restore the Coast.
Good.{nl}Please take this holy water.{nl}
This holy water is blessed by Jurate and is mixed with a few materials used during exorcisms.{nl}I used the fragments you collected to test which materials would cause the corruption to react.{nl}
I then sprayed the holy water on buried fragments and they melted away, purifying the area.{nl}So I recommend going to the Eperotao Coast and using the holy water on areas that feel corrupted.
Please purify the coast.{nl}I will continue to research other ways to fight the corruption.{nl}
It looks like the holy water was put to good use!{nl}Well done.{nl}
The corruption has disappeared from view but there may still be some residue hiding out of sight.{nl}I'll grateful for your help.{nl}
Ugnius and I will stay here and investigate the remaining corruption and purify it.

The demons are still greedy for the Coral Plains.{nl}{nl}Through your deeds you have protected the Coral Plains from the demons thus far, but they lie in wait for their next opportunity. {nl}I ask that you continue to protect the coral and the ocean.

Archivist Jonas seem to have finally regained his consciousness. Jonas told you to follow him as there is a task that you are qualified to do. In order for Jonas to guide you safely to Beacon Hill Pass, defeat monsters along the way.
Find Sentinel Rian
You are now allowed to use instanced dungeons.{nl}Instanced dungeons help you raise your character faster.{nl}{nl}Type

In the chat window to see the location and recommended level of all instanced dungeons.{nl}First, check the location of the Underground Chapel Dungeon in Klaipeda.{nl}{nl}Then, find Sentinel Rian.{nl}You can enter the instanced dungeon by interacting with the sentinel.
Speak with Revelator Pudhin
Revelator Pudhin seems to be facing a difficult situation. Talk to him.
Retrieve the stolen supplies
Revelator Pudhin said the monsters purposely robbed him of the supplies. Retrieve the items the monsters stole.
All of the supplies that were stolen from Revelator Pudhin have been retrieved. Return to him.
You helped Pudhin recover the stolen supplies. Listen to what happened to him.
Revelator Pudhin seems to have something to say to you.
Deal with the savage monsters
Revelator Pudhin said to go meet with Loremaster Ugnius in Mopuli Lowlands. While making your way there, deal with the savage monsters.
Speak with Loremaster Ugnius
The savage monsters Revelator Pudhin mentioned have been taken care of. Talk to Loremaster Ugnius in Mopuli Lowlands.
Discuss with Loremaster Ugnius what happened at Igyti Seashore with Goddess Jurate and listen to a story about the Goddess.
Loremaster Ugnius seems to have a request for you.
Find Loremaster Narius
Loremaster Ugnius said that Loremaster Narius has not returned from repairing the altar. Carefully check for the Loremaster as the area has become dangerous.
Speak with Loremaster Narius
You've rescued Loremaster Narius. Go talk to him.
Defeat the attacking monster
Loremaster Narius is wounded. Ask him if there is a way to treat his injuries.
Defeat the monsters and collect the medicine
Loremaster Narius' injuries are serious. He has asked that you bring Loremaster Ugnius to treat him. On your way, defeat the monsters and collect the medicine that could help treat Loremaster Narius.
You've collected the medicine. Give the medicine to Loremaster Ugnius and explain the situation.
Loremaster Ugnius looks like he wants to go to Loremaster Narius. Talk with him.
Escort Loremaster Ugnius
Escort Loremaster Ugnius safely to Loremaster Narius. Protect Loremaster Ugnius from attacking monsters and escort him to Loremaster Narius' location.
Check on Loremaster Narius
Loremaster Ugnius is preparing a ritual to hear the voice of the Goddess Jurate. Talk to him.
Collect Blue Coral
Loremaster Ugnius is asking you to collect some blue coral instead of Loremaster Ugnius.
You have collected all the coral Loremaster Ugnius requested. Return to him.
Loremaster Ugnius is about to start the offering ceremony to Goddess Jurate. Talk to him.
Loremaster Ugnius seems to have something to say to you.
Speak with Revelator Nichi
Loremaster Ugnius asked you to go to Aitheo Coast and meet with Revelator Nichi. Talk to her.
Loremaster Narius seems to have a request for you.
Investigate Tolata Sandbank
Loremaster Narius said he saw a few demons roaming around Tolata Sandbank. Go investigate the area.
You have found the suspicious crystal at Tolata Sandbank that Loremaster Narius mentioned. Return to him.
Revelator Nichi is preparing something. Talk to her.
Clear out the Demons
Revelator Nichi has asked you to remove the Nimrah and Varle that roam the area.
Occupied Lowlands Recon
Revelator Nichi has asked you to clear out the Nimrah and Varle and to report back about the occupied lowlands. Go to the occupied lowlands.
Defeat the Nimrah and Varle
Loremaster Ugnius has arrived. Talk to him about what you saw at the occupied lowlands.
Search for the relic at the occupied lowlands
Loremaster Ugnius believes the magic circles seen at the occupied lowlands being used to seal the relic. Use Goddess Jurate's relic to break the magic circles and retrieve the relic.
You have retrieved the relic that was sealed by the demons. Return to Loremaster Ugnius.
Break the magic circle and retrieve %s
Loremaster Ugnius seems to know a way to remove the seal from the sealed relic. Talk to him.
Purifying the Sealed Relic
Loremaster Ugnius has recommended that you use the ocean's energy to wash the sealed relic. Go to Kite Coral Reef and use the energy in the coral to repel the evil from the relic.
You have completed the task that Loremaster Ugnius requested of you. Return to him.
Loremaster Ugnius looks like he is going to remove the seal from the washed relic. Talk to him.
Corrupted Sandbank Recon
Loremaster Ugnius has asked you to scout out the suspicious device the demons have placed on the Corrupted Sandbank.
It seems the demons have started to attack. Alert Loremaster Ugnius.
Eradicate the demon forces
Loremaster Ugnius seems to have made a decision. Speak with him.
Destroy the corrupted sandbank's suspicious device
Loremaster Ugnius says to destroy the suspicious device at the corrupted sandbank as quickly as possible. He said he will meet you there. Go first to the Corrupted Sandbank.
You successful destroyed the device. Speak with Loremaster Ugnius.
Loremaster Ugnius is preparing to purify the demon corrupted coast. Collect the necessary materials to complete the preparations.
You have collected all the material that Loremaster Ugnius requested. Return to him.
It seems that Loremaster Ugnius will begin the Purification Ritual.
Loremaster Ugnius has finished the ritual. Talk to him.
Loremaster Ugnius went ahead first to the Eperotao Coast. Find Loremaster Ugnius at Eperotao Coast.
Revelator Nichi may be planning to remove the remaining corruption from the Aitheo Coast.
Clear the Aitheo Coast of the remaining evil energy
As Revelator Nichi said, the purification ritual cleared the source of the pollution but some evil still remains. Use the Coral Talisman given to you by Nichi and release this evil energy.
You cleared the Aitheo Coast of the remaining evil energy. Go tell Revelator Nichi.
Revelator Nichi seems to have a request for you.
Defeat the demons at Aitheo Coast
Revelator Nichi has asked you to defeat the remaining demon forces.
You defeated the remaining demons as Revelator Nichi requested. Report back to Revelator Nichi.
Loremaster Ugnius seems to have a scouting request for you.
Coral Forest Hill Recon
Loremaster Ugnius has asked you to scout out Coral Forest Hill.
You have completed Loremaster Ugnius request to check Coral Forest Hill. Return to him.
Loremaster Ugnius seems determined about something. Speak with him.
Deal with the demon forces at Coral Forest Hill
Loremaster Ugnius has asked you to defeat the demon forces on Coral Forest Hill so that he can follow.
Investigate the Demon Device
You defeated the demons on Coral Forest Hill according to Loremaster Ugnius' request. Go back to the demon device and wait for him.
Defeat the demon forces
Loremaster Ugnius has arrived. Talk to him.
Protect Loremaster Ugnius
Loremaster Ugnius said he is going to destroy the device. While he is doing so, keep him safe.
The device was successfully destroyed. Speak with Loremaster Ugnius.
Loremaster Ugnius has already gone ahead to locate the other Revelators. Follow him.
Destroy the Third Demon Device
The other Revelator and Loremasters are working to destroy the third demon device. Go help them.
The third demon device was destroyed. Speak with Loremaster Ugnius.
Defeat the forces protecting the device
It seems like Loremaster Ugnius wants to explain more about the demon's trap.
Avoid the demon's trap and destroy the suppressor
Because of the demon's trap, Loremaster Ugnius said the path to the Kruvina is too dangerous. Avoid the demon's trap and destory the suppressor.
You destroyed the device blocking the way to the Massive Kruvina. Listen to Loremaster Ugnius next plan.
Destroy the Massive Kruvina at the Heart of the Sea.
Loremaster Ugnius has said to go destroy the Massive Kruvina. He will gather the other Revelators and Loremasters and meet you there.
Destroy the Massive Kruvina
You helped Loremaster Ugnius destroy the Massive Kruvina. Talk to him.
Talk with Loremaster Emmanuelis
It looks like Loremaster Emmanuelis is researching the demon's effects on the coast. Speak to him.
Collect the Demon Device Fragments
Loremaster Emmanuelis is researching the corruption effect of the demon device. Collect pieces of the broken device to help with his research.
You have collected the pieces of the demon device. Return to Emmanuelis.
Emmanuelis seems like he has figured someone out. Talk to him.
Purify the Corrupted Piles of Soil
The source of the corruption remains in the ground. Take the bottle that contains holy water from Loremaster Emmanuelis and use it to purify the corrupted piles of soil.
You have purified all the piles of soil that Emmanuelis requested of you. Return to him.
Emmanuelis seems to have a request for you.
Eradicate the surviving demon forces
Emmanuelis has asked you to defeat the remaining demon forces in Eperotao Coast. Go and eradicate them.
As Emmanuelis requested, you have forced out all the remaining forces. Return to him.
Defeat the remaining demon forces

The fact that a metal, Mana Metal, with such high resistance against magic exists is strange, but if such a metal does exist, then there couldn't have been enough to make more than one set of armor. The commander, Ruklys, would have been the only one wearing such an armor, otherwise it wouldn't make sense if the Mana Metal were distributed to that many of his troops.{nl}It is just as reasonable that the opposite was true.
No place in the Kingdom is safe anymore...
Our Kingdom needs to be at peace again...
My mother passed away when I was born.{nl}My father worked very hard to make sure I was raised properly.
Now I want to do the same and earn the money to sustain him.
I came to Tenants' Farm looking for a stable life, but that isn't easy anymore.{nl}I feel like I'm only giving my father more to worry about.
The combat style of the Nak Muay is very different from other kinds you may know. We attack the enemy with our hands, feet, elbows and knees.
The risk of injury is high, and it is not an easy style to learn.
No matter how strong you are, you must never underestimate your opponent.{nl}If you do, the Nak Muay technique becomes nothing but a means for violence.
Traveling Merchant Geraldas
However, I also have a request since this is a hard task.{nl}I would prefer to receive some Blue Gapcrab Shell as compensation.{nl}
Well then, off you go.{nl}I'll start working assuming that you'll bring me some quiality materials.{nl}{nl}You can find Blue Gapcrab at Nugara Sandbank in Cranto Coast.

The demons are still greedy for the Coral Plains.{nl}{nl}Through your deeds you have protected the Coral Plains from the demons thus far, but they lie in wait for their next opportunity. {nl}I ask that you continue to protect the coral and the ocean.
Gem Draw Merchant
Shutdown
Unlock Legend Card Slot
Complete the quests to find the nine Revelations and unlock the Legend Card slot.
The Legend Card slot was unlocked by the power of the goddesses!
Unlock the Legend Card slot with the power of the goddesses.
Complete the nine Revelation quests and receive the power of the goddesses.
Unlock the Legend Card slot at the statue of Goddess Ausrine in Klaipeda.
Collect Blue Gapcrab Shells at Cranto Coast
Accessory Merchant Joana has asked for whole Gap Crab Shell in return for her services. Collect whole Gap Crab Shells from Igti Coast.
Ebonyphon...{nl}The Ranger Master still seems to hold some regret.{nl}

Retiarius, and similar gladiators like the Murmillo, gain passionate support from the spectators while in the arena. But in the moments before defeat, that support crumbles like a castle made of sand.
As a gladiator I have witnessed this many times.{nl}And, rather than live by the cries of the crowd, I have survived by my own determination and have ended here.
All of the arenas were destroyed after Medzio Diena.{nl} So I had assumed I would no longer have to take on the mantle of the gladiator.
But there is no way of knowing when or where these monsters and demons may attack, and now it is as though I am fighting for survival at a level higher than what I had faced in the arena.
Ah, I... would like to ask you for something.{nl} I just need you to take this pouch to the Cleric Master.{nl} You can do that right?
You won't forget right?{nl}Take that and give it to the Cleric Master.{nl}And, don't say that I was the one to send you.
You say you have something to give me...? This pouch?{nl}
... Ah, a donation. This is much needed. I thank you in the name of the Goddess.{nl}I promise to use this to help those who have been hurt.
I'm looking for a book. Lydia Schaffen's four books.{nl}I really would like to gather them all. If you have time, could you help me find them?
The first book. Thank you for finding it. Please find the others as well.{nl}Once all the books are found, I promise to give you a copy.
You found all the books. You've done well.{nl}Now wait here just a moment.
Alright, here. As promised, I've made a copy. Enjoy.{nl}And thank you for your help.
There is an important task at hand, but no one to help me.{nl}Would you be willing to lend a hand?
Seems like there is no one I can give this task to... Ah, my apologies. I was thinking out loud and didn't notice you.{nl}
... Ah, you really have no inclination to help?{nl} But this will benefit not only my fellow Peltastas but also you as well.
Good answer.{nl}Now, go to Tenet Church B1, gather Black Glizardon Nails, and give them to the Highlander Master.
It's fortunate that the Highlander Master found them to his liking. {nl}You worked hard. I hope that this strengthens you as well. Thank you for your help.
Oh, it's you. I just received a request for support from the Peltasta Master.{nl}We would like to help, but in our current situation it would be too difficult.{nl}
If it's okay with you, you could lend us a hand.{nl}In my stead, could you go check on the Peltasta Master?
There are rumors circling that a powerful monster is roaming around Crystal Mine 2F.{nl} Because of this the people living in the town next to the mine are feeling nervous.{nl}
In lieu of us, please go to Crystal Mine 2F, find the culprit behind the rumors and get rid of them.
So he was still on a rampage... You're lucky you weren't harmed.{nl}To continue to ease the minds of the townspeople, I will position some soldiers there.
Well done. Thanks to you I was able to finish my other tasks.{nl}I appreciate your continual help.
Thank you for your help before. Because of you we were able to keep our pledge with the Highlanders... but{nl}recently another problem has appeared.{nl}
The highlanders promised to provide the Peltasta with a shield.{nl}And I was expecting to receive it yesterday but it never got delivered.{nl}
If you have the time, would you please talk with the Highlander Master about this?
I see, so that was the situation. Good job.{nl}Thanks to you our pledge with the Highlanders remains firm.{nl}Once again, thank you for your help.
Hm... ah, sorry, I didn't see you there. I was lost in thought.{nl}... Wait. You look like you have some time on your hands. Care to help me?
This fragrance... Yes, it's Ebonyphon's.{nl}This is enough. Thanks for helping on such short notice.
I'm currently researching something very fascinating.{nl}You can lend me a hand if you're interested. How about it?
Yes! My research can now go on to the next level.{nl}Thanks for the help.
If you would spare the time, there is something you can help me with.{nl}I promise it will be exciting. Will you accept?
There is no need to feel guilty. You did very well.{nl}The rest of the task I will do myself.
Uhhm... This will be annoying. Either way I will have to go get it...{nl}
Hm? What am I talking about?{nl}
For your information, it's not easy to explain.{nl}But... if you agree to help I can tell you more.
I will explain it very clearly.{nl}And I expect you to keep your word.{nl}
I heard the lost telescope lens from the Astral Tower is at the Miners' Village. {nl}Get me that lens before the other masters find out. I'll leave it to you.
I knew that one day I would finally see this for myself.{nl}Thank you. I will ensure that this treasure is properly stored.
Wait, I have a single mission for you.{nl}This is very very important to me.
So it was a success. {nl}You have matched my expectations. Well done.
Hm... so he has appeared again... Oh, I didn't see you approach. Hahaha.{nl}Yes? Oh, you are wondering what I was mumbling about?{nl}
Hm... well, if it's you...{nl}It would be good if you could hear me out. I have some important work for you.
That is definitely the tip of the spear I drove into it.{nl}Hahaha, although I didn't defeat it myself, with this, it will become a story for the legends. Thanks.
There is a book I wish to find.{nl}But it cannot be retrieved by normal means.{nl}
It's because this book is one from another world.{nl}What do you think? Interested? Would you like to help?
Good. First, I will need some ingredients.{nl}Please bring me the core of Corylus and the blood of Galok in Tenet Church 1F.
Excellent.{nl}Wait a moment. There is something I can make with this.
Thank you for your patience.{nl}Now on to the next step.

Did you know? In Tenet Church 1F there is a small gap that opens into a two-dimensional world.{nl}To most people the area looks perfectly ordinary.{nl}But for Linkers such as myself, the gap can be found quite easily.{nl}
I have made you a key so that you may find the entrance.{nl} I have also marked the location on your map, so take the key and go there.
With the key you will be able to enter the two-dimensional world.{nl}If you happen to locate the book, please bring it to me.
You have returned with the book. Thank you.{nl}Would you wait just a moment?
You also showed particular interest in this book.{nl}Therefore, I have made you a copy so that you can read it.
I hope that you find the book compelling. Thank you.
I'm searching for an important book.{nl}This is a very precious book to me and I would be grateful if you could help.
Yes, this is it. This is the book. I was searching for it for so long...{nl}It's amazing that you were able to find it.{nl}
Thank you for your help.{nl}Please wait here.
The Hunter Master said that I would trade?{nl}Yes, Tough Glizardon Leather for the book.{nl}
Ohoh, that's the leather. Let's see...{nl}Hm... This is very sturdy. Very nice.{nl}
Well then, here is the book the Hunter Master wants.{nl}Make sure that he gets it.
He is helping repair the damaged city wall.{nl}But it seems that they have started to run out of material.{nl}
Consider bringing him some rocks from the Miner's Village.{nl}Those rocks are known for their sturdiness. The Archer Master will also like them.
I know I should have sent a letter of apology and I'm sorry about that.{nl}In truth, I've been busy asking the Fletcher Master to send the shield he had promised.
I've sent him numerous demands to do so, but he continues to reject me.{nl}What could be the problem... Would you mind checking on the Fletcher Master for me?
The Fletcher Master should be at the Goddess' Ancient Garden.{nl}Go there and clarify the situation.
You've come from Klaipeda, you say?{nl}If it's because of the Highlander Master, go back. No amount of urging will change the situation.
Did you not hear me?{nl}I've received too many requests for arrows.{nl}
Whatever the circumstances these requests take paramount.{nl}It will be awhile before I can complete yours.
The demons from the mines attacked and took everything.{nl}I'm not sure why, but if you are talking about that book it was probably taken during that time.{nl}
The demons returned to Crystal Mine but...{nl}If you want to find that book, I would recommend checking the Mine Worker's Resting Place in Crystal Mine 2F.{nl}
The demons could be using it as a storing facility since there are already other supplies stacked there.{nl}The book should be there, or at least in that area.{nl}
I would like to repay you for the trouble you went through.{nl}I have prepared a copy of the book you found for me. I hope you will take a moment to read it in your free time.
After defeating it, please bring back the tip of the spear that remains skewered in its body. {nl}I would like to keep it as proof of our heated battle. Please do this for me.
Raid Message
You have survived a formidable experience!{nl}Speak with the Wings of Vaivora NPC to record your experience and collect your reward!
Guilty Conscience (1)
I can at least do that.
I won't do something that sounds so suspicious.
