Deliver the pouch from the Sapper Master to the Cleric Master!

Legend of the Winter Season (2)
Guilty Conscience
The Sapper Master wants to donate and return the stolen goods to repent for the past. Find the stolen goods at Flude Island in West Siauliai Woods.
The Sapper Master wants to donate and return the stolen goods to repent for the past. Find the stolen goods at Flude Island in West Siauliai Woods.
Return the recovered stolen goods to the Item Merchant in Klaipeda.
Return the recovered stolen goods to the Item Merchant in Klaipeda.
Deliver the Pouch to the Cleric Master
Deliver the pouch to the Cleric Master!
You've successfully delivered the pouch to the Cleric Master. Report back to the Sapper Master.
The Dream Bow Book
The Hunter Master asked you to help him search for the books. As the Hunter Master mentioned, search for the books at the Vubbe Outpost near the Miner's Village.
Collect Tough Glizardon Leather in Tenet Church B1
The Hunter Master told the Quarrel Shooter Master that they could exchange the Tough Glizardon Leather for the book. Obtain Tough Glizardon Leather in Tenet Church B1.
You have collected enough Tough Glizardon Leather. Return to the Quarrel Shooter in Klaipeda and exchange them for the book.
Deliver the book to the Quarrel Shooter, then speak with the Hunter Master for the whereabouts of the next one.
Collect Rocks from the Crystal Mine Entrance in Miners' Village
The Archer Master has the next book. Collect rocks from the Crystal Mine entrance in Miners' Village for the Archer Master.
You've gathered the rocks the Archer Master would need. Go to the Archer Master in Klaipeda and exchange the rocks for the book.
You've received the book from the Archer Master. Speak with the Hunter Master to collect the final one.
Shield Over Flowers
Obtain the coarse tree barks of Yognome in Tenet Church B1 as compensation for receiving help from the Peltasta Master.
Pledge of Duty
The Peltasta Master gave you a mission. Obtain Glizardon's Black Nails from the Glizardon in Tenet Church B1.
Highlander Master request that you ask the Peltasta Master for help on his behalf.{nl}Go find the Peltasta Master.
The Peltasta Master informed you that she received a request for help from Uska but doesn't have time to answer it. Go meet with Uska on behalf of the Peltasta Master.
Commander Uska mentioned that the monsters appearing from Crystal Mine 2F are causing people in the Miner's Village to feel nervous. Go to Crystal Mine 2F to find the culprit and put end to it.
The Peltasta Master says the Highlanders are not keeping their promise of supplying shields and asks that you put some pressure on them. Go check on the Highlander Master.
It seems that something happened to the Fletcher Master from whom the Highlander Master requested the trade. Meet the Fletcher Master in the Goddess' Ancient Garden.
The Fletcher Master told you to go back, but until the request is accepted, you can't.{nl}Speak to the Fletcher Master again.
The Fletcher Master told you that if you could defeat Moas, he will move up your request. Defeat Moas which is attacking merchants traveling between Fedimian Suburbs and Fedimian.
Fedimian's Investigator
The Sadhu Master told you that he saw a man who seemed to be Ebonyphon talking to the Elementalist Submaster. Meet with the Elementalist Submaster and listen to the information about Ebonyphon.
The Elementalist Submaster remembers a man with a strange fragrance. Talk to the Elementalist Submaster about the whereabouts of this man.
The Elementalist Submaster gave you the location of the person who seems to be Ebonyphon is headed towards. The person was looking for ingredients and would likely be there.
The Cryomancer Master told you to open a box in the Pyromancer Master's room and bring the contents to her. Something about it feels strange but let's open the box anyway.
The Quarrel Shooter says he's been looking for the telescope that used to be in the Astral Tower and has found clues about the whereabouts of the lens. Try finding the lens in the Miner's Village.
Defeat Shadowgaler
The Ranger Master mentioned an assassin named Ebonyphon and wants the venom sample he used. Collect samples of venom from the Vubbe in Miner's Village.
A Book Not of This World
The Link Submaster has asked you to gather a few materials to help you find the book from another world. Collect Corylus Cores and Galok Blood from the monsters inTenet Church 1F.
You have gather all the necessary materials. Deliver them to the Linker Submaster
Speak with the Linker Submaster to find the book from another world.
Take the key from the Linker Master and find the location of the two-dimensional world in Tenet Church 1F to recover the book.
You have successfully found the book. Just as promised, deliver the book to the Linker Master.
Legend of the Winter Season
Crystal Mine 2F Book Investigation
The Siauliai Miners' Village Mayor said that the demons returned to the Crystal Mine after  ransacking the Miner's Village. Check the area around the storage facility in Miner's Village 2F.
Salão de Beleza
Solo Dungeon
The Novaha Institute Chapparition has taken far too many lives.{nl}Rid us of it, in the name of the goddesses.
The Paladin Master says that a cruel monster has been slaughtering people. Find the Bleak Chapparition boss monster at the Novaha Institute and defeat it..
Ane e Aldoni já deveriam ter chegado.
Elas estão atrasadas.{nl}Elas estavam em Fantomas street na última vez que as vi, me pergunto se algo aconteceu com elas.
Por favor, me conte imediatamente se algo aconteceu com elas.

Quando chegamos, o Quipmage estava roubando os documentos de pesquisa antigos do dispositivo.{nl}Consegui lançar um feitiço de rastreamento nele enquanto Aldoni estava distraindo.{nl}Ele está indo para Spresti Lot.
Suponho que ele está indo se encontrar com o Beholder lá.
Ane disse que o Quipmage está indo para Spresti Lot.{nl}Não sei por quanto tempo o feitiço de rastreamento vai durar.{nl}Ane disse que talvez o Beholder esteja lá, mas é apenas uma suposição.
O que quero dizer é que devemos pará-lo enquanto ele está em movimento.
O Quipmage é responsável por causar o incidente em Nicopolis que tirou a vida de milhares de pessoas.{nl}E ele está trabalhando junto com o Beholder.
Ele pode conseguir escapar da barreira e causar danos ao mundo exterior.{nl}Eu não ligo se você vem ou não.{nl}Eu vou parar o Beholder e o Quipmage sozinha.
Não consigo deixar de me preocupar com ela. Vamos segui-la.
Está tudo certo contigo, viajante? Fico feliz que esteja bem.
O que aconteceu com o Quipmage?{nl}
Aldoni foi muito imprudente ao enfrentar Quipmage sozinha.{nl}Mas graças a você, os danos causados foram mínimos.
Os Documentos de Pesquisa Antigos foram trocados e o Quipmage foi derrotado.{nl}Se o Beholder descobrir, ele vai tentar roubá-los novamente.
Leve isso para Lena, da Asas de Vaivora, para mantê-lo seguro.
Entregue a Cópia Original dos Documentos de Pesquisa Antigos para Lena em Klaipeda.
Então esses são os documentos de pesquisa do Quipmage que causou o incidente em Nicopolis.
Parece que está escrito na linguagem dos demônios.{nl}Vamos mantê-lo seguro para que não caia nas mãos do Beholder.
Arquivos de Pesquisa Ocultos
A Cidade Sob Ameaça (1)
Eu vou dar uma olhada.
A Cidade Sob Ameaça (2)
Você vai ficar bem?
Boa sorte.
A Cidade Sob Ameaça (3)
O que você vai fazer com os documentos de pesquisa?
Eu acredito que você pode fazer isso sozinho.
Encontrando os Documentos de Pesquisa Antigos
O Mestre Cryomancer disse que está procurando por um livro, e quer que você o ajude a encontrá-lo. Fale com o prefeito de Siaulai Miner's Village e pergunte sobre o livro.
column4: O Mestre Cryomancer disse que está procurando por um livro, e quer que você o ajude a encontrá-lo. Fale com o prefeito de Siaulai Miner's Village e pergunte sobre o livro.

Sentinela: Encontre Documentos de Pesquisa Antigos.
A Cidade Sob Ameaça
Procure pelo Resto das Wizards
Vá e procure aonde está o resto das Wizards
Fale com Wizard Ane
Fale com Wizard Ane.
Derrote o Quipmage
Persiga Quipmage e o derrote.
Procure e derrote o Quipmage
Fale com Asas de Vaivora
Fale com Asas de Vaivora.
They're running late.{nl}They were in Fantomas street the last I saw them, I am worried something has happened to them.
column3: 생각보다 늦어요.{nl}그들은 판토마스 골목에 있는데  혹시 무슨 일이 있나 걱정이 되네요.
column5: They're running late.{nl}They were in Fantomas street the last I saw them, I am worried something has happened to them.
column6: 생각보다 너무 늦어요.{nl}걔네들은 판토마스 골목에 있는데  혹시 무슨 일이 있나 걱정이 되네요.

Sentinela: Ane said that the Quipmage was headed for Spresti Lot.{nl}I don't know how long the tracking spell is going to last.{nl}Ane said that the Beholder may be there, but it's just her assumption.
column3: 아네가 큅메이지가 스프레스티 공터로 갔다고 했어요.{nl}추적 마법이 언제까지 큅메이지를 추적할지 알 수 없어요.{nl}주시자가 있을지도 모른다는 아네의 말은 추측일 뿐이에요.
column5: Ane said that the Quipmage was headed for Spresti Lot.{nl}I don't know how long the tracking spell is going to last.{nl}Ane said that the Beholder may be there, but it's just her assumption.
column6: 아네가 큅메이지가 스프레스티 공터로 갔다고 했어요.{nl}추적 마법이 언제까지 큅메이지를 추적할지는 알 수 없어요.{nl}주시자가 있을지도 모른다는 아네의 말은 추측일 뿐이에요.

Sentinela: It was reckless of Aldoni to face the Quipmage alone.{nl}But thanks to you, the damage done could be kept to a minimum.
column3: 큅메이지를 상대하려 하다니 알도니는 정말 무모했어요.{nl}그래도 여행자님의 실력 덕분에 큰 피해는 없어 다행이에요.
column5: It was reckless of Aldoni to face the Quipmage alone.{nl}But thanks to you, the damage done could be kept to a minimum.
column6: 알도니는 큅메이지를 상대하려 하다니 정말 무모했어요.{nl}그래도 여행자님의 실력 덕분에 큰 피해는 없어 다행이에요.

Sentinela: The Old Research Papers have been switched and the Quipmage was also defeated.{nl}If the Beholder finds out, he will try to steal them again.
column3: 오래된 연구 기록도 전부 바꾸고 큅메이지도 처치했어요.{nl}그렇지만 연구 기록지가 바뀌었다는 사실을 주시자가 알게 된다면 분명히 빼앗으려 들 거에요.
column5: The Old Research Papers have been switched and the Quipmage was also defeated.{nl}If the Beholder finds out, he will try to steal them again.
column6: 오래된 연구 기록도 전부 바꾸고 큅메이지도 처치했어요.{nl}그렇지만 연구 기록지가 바뀌었다는 사실을 주시자가 알게 된다면 분명히 빼았으려 들거에요.

Sentinela: So these are the research papers of the Quipmage that caused the incident at Nicopolis.
column3: 니코폴리스 사고의 주동자인 큅메이지의 연구 기록이라고요?
column5: So these are the research papers of the Quipmage that caused the incident at Nicopolis.
column6: 니코폴리스 사고에 주동자인 큅메이지의 연구 기록이라고요?

Sentinela: Looks like it's written in the language of the demons.{nl}We will keep it safe so that it doesn't fall into the Beholder's hands.
column3: 읽어보니 마족어 같아요.{nl}이게 주시자의 손에 안 들어가도록 저희가 지킬게요.
column5: Looks like it's written in the language of the demons.{nl}We will keep it safe so that it doesn't fall into the Beholder's hands.
column6: 읽어보니 마족어인거 같아요.{nl}이게 주시자의 손에 안 들어가도록 저희가 지킬게요.

Sentinela: But, see, if someone talented like you can take me there...{nl}I can teach them not to disrespect their village chief.{nl}
column3: 그러니 자네같은 실력자를 내가 데려 왔다고 한다면 말이지.{nl}감히 이 촌장을 함부로 못 대할 거라고.{nl}
column5: But, see, if someone talented like you can take me there...{nl}I can teach them not to disrespect their village chief.{nl}
column6: 그러니 자네같은 실력자를 내가 대려 왔다고 한다면 말이지.{nl}감히 이 촌장을 함부로 못 대할 거라고.{nl}

Sentinela: Hmm... It is rather familiar... But I don't remember.{nl}Coud I have misplaced it?
column3: 음.. 분명 낯이 익은 물건인데.. 기억이 나질 않네요.{nl}내가 언제 이런 걸 잃어버린 걸까..?

Sentinela: Did you deliver the goods?{nl}If not, please do so. I don't have the courage to go myself...
column3: 혹시 물건은 다 전해줬어?{nl}아직이라면 부탁할게. 내가 가기엔 용기가 나질 않아서..

Sentinela: Ah, o Salvador.{nl}Veio atrás do que mesmo?
Ele disse que a dor começou quando o Wizard veio na Apega Protocol Room.{nl}Vou ficar de olho nele aqui.{nl}Vá e ache um meio de parar isso. Rápido!
Não há missões impossíveis para um Assassin.{nl}Se existir, somente em sonhos.
Como já sabe, Assassins encontram o ponto fraco até do mais forte inimigo.{nl}Não importa o quanto ele possa estar escondido.
Entregue a bolsa do Mestre Sapper para a Mestre Cleric!
